programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: Clive Myries Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: In Jamaicas capital city, Clive learns he has hidden talents when it comes to trying out some dancehall moves. He explores a 19th-century mansion which tells the story of Jamaicas first black millionaire and heads to the school that has produced most of the countrys Olympic sprinting talent. Clive also makes time to head for the hills to sample a special Jamaican-Irish stout punch as he learns of the long connection between these two islands.

programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: Kevin Sinfield: 7 in 7 Together
programme.desc: Inspired by the death of his friend and team mate, rugby league legend Kevin Sinfield takes to the streets of the UK and Republic of Ireland to raise money and awareness for those impacted by motor neurone disease. Kevin and his team have already raised over £10m with five previous challenges. In December 2025, he ran seven ultramarathons in seven days. Kevins former Leeds Rhinos colleague Rob Burrow died of MND in 2024. Six charities will benefit from this challenge, which will be a test of endurance, logistical planning and a testament to a lifelong friendship.

programme.title: Arts in Motion
programme.desc: Arts in Motion is a thrilling series, showcasing renowned cultural figures sharing their insights with the next generation. This series will encompass multiple disciplines, including dance, music, visual art and performance-based work. Each episode centres around a masterclass led by a major cultural figure working with aspiring artists at the beginning of their careers. This unique opportunity allows young creatives to learn from a world leading artist and refine their craft.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

Elvi florbola virslīga vīriešiem. Lekrings vs Irlava Avant
Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташа считает себя виновной в смерти супруга. Он погиб в ДТП, не сумев справиться с управлением. Незадолго до несчастного случая пара эмоционально выясняла отношения. Именно из-за этого муж Наташи в сердцах сел за руль.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташа сталкивается с предательством друзей. Кроме того, ее прессуют братки. Она с ужасом выясняет о своем супруге много нового. У мужчины была другая фамилия и семья, о которой Наташа ничего не знала.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташе становится известно, что Тома ждет ребенка от Игоря. Отец пытается ее утешить. Он заверяет девушку, что она поедет во Францию. В это время Игорь пытается доехать до города. Он слишком долго пробыл в доме Томы.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Тамара солгала Наталье о своей беременности. К утру Игорь все-таки доезжает до дома возлюбленной. Ему открывает двери ее отец. Он сообщает, что Наташа находится на пути в аэропорт. Игорь намерен догнать ее.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: В результате перестрелки 38-летний оперативный работник следственного отдела МВД Сергий Никонов получает тяжелейшую травму позвоночника. У Сергея парализованы ноги, он может передвигаться лишь в инвалидном кресле. Чтобы отвлечься от своей личной трагедии и справиться с депрессией, Сергей организовывает у себя в квартире неофициальный отдел по расследованию криминальных преступлений.

programme.title: Тёмные лабиринты прошлого
programme.desc: Лиза, поссорившись с мужем, уходит из дома. Только на следующий день его брат находит невестку в лесу без сознания. Лиза не может вспомнить, кто она. Теперь ей предстоит привыкать к прежней жизни. Муж Борис ей кажется совершенно посторонним человеком, а повседневная работа по дому совсем непривычной. Лизу одолевают то смутные воспоминания, то провалы в памяти. Она начинает подозревать у себя признаки психического расстройства. А тем временем на регистратора частной клиники Ирину совершено нападение - девушку спасает случайный прохожий…

programme.desc: Каждый день в США содержимое более чем 10000 снятых и брошенных складов выставляется на аукцион. Следите за двумя профессиональными скупщиками, делающими ставки в поисках сокровищ.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: В результате перестрелки 38-летний оперативный работник следственного отдела МВД Сергий Никонов получает тяжелейшую травму позвоночника. У Сергея парализованы ноги, он может передвигаться лишь в инвалидном кресле. Чтобы отвлечься от своей личной трагедии и справиться с депрессией, Сергей организовывает у себя в квартире неофициальный отдел по расследованию криминальных преступлений.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: На вечеринке "Трансгаза" был отравлен вице-президент компании. Раскрыть "щекотливое" дело берутся Никонов, Скребцов и Аня. Но что стало причиной трагедии: любовные связи или грязный бизнес?

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов назначен начальником лаборатории. Он пытается сблизиться с Анной, но она вновь его отталкивает. Она не знает, что Лёшка попал под влияние только что вышедшего из тюрьмы преступника по фамилии Голубев. Тем временем в карьере найден труп молодого мужчины. Крылов сразу же выдвигает неожиданную версию – перед смертью с жертвой кто-то играл в догонялки…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов обнаруживает странную статистику смертей пациентов в клинике, где работал его отец и просит свою помощницу и подругу Матвеевну устроиться туда на работу "под прикрытием". Борису не дают покоя несколько фактов в деле убийства сына олигарха. Крылов проводит необычный следственный эксперимент и понимает, как именно было совершено это преступление…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Водоворот чужих желаний
programme.desc: В доме Зильберта происходит ограбление. Группа в масках находит то, зачем пришли, и кто-то из соучастников хватает еще некоторые вещи. На выходе из дома встречают курьеров с доставкой рассады и убивают одного из них. Шмидт приходит к Макару с просьбой найти Русалку. Он рассказывает про нее и обещает заплатить немалые деньги, если ее найдут. Макар не хочет соглашаться, но Шмидт знает, как уговорить. Олег Борисович приглашает Катю задержаться вечером.

programme.title: Водоворот чужих желаний
programme.desc: Олег догадывается, что Русалка найдена. Макар с Сергеем начинают распутывать дело Русалки. С каждым днем все больше новых событий и действующих лиц. Заложница Белова в фургоне не обнаружена, хотя ей свидетельские показания, что ее убили. Нужно заниматься проверкой. Макар и Сергей пытаются разобраться с информацией, но пока помощи от Шмидта немного.

programme.title: Водоворот чужих желаний
programme.desc: Получили первые рисунки Русалки, уже проще продолжать расследование. Пока это единственные положительные моменты в ходе движения дела. Катя с Ларисой обсуждают рабочие вопросы и личную жизнь друг друга. С помощью друзей из органов Макар получил первых подозреваемых по делу, Сергей должен проверить каждого из них. Выясняются некоторые важные детали из истории Русалки. История не для слабонервных, Макар не верит свои ушам, но это правда.

programme.title: Водоворот чужих желаний
programme.desc: Макар ловит подозреваемого, но понимает, что эта история про магический артефакт очень странная. Показания Викуловой кажутся неправдоподобными, это нужно выяснить, иначе дело не сдвинется. Катя явно что-то скрывает, и Капитошин понимает это. Макар с Сергеем проверяют даже самые сомнительные показания, но только так можно хоть в чем-то разобраться. Катя многое знает про Русалку, но она не готова делиться информацией. Макар должен найти способ получить эту информацию.

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball wants to get Richard on the cheerleading team in order to end their familys generational trauma.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Penny must stay together all day to prove their bond, defying Mr. Smalls astrological prediction.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Using a grandma voice Cyborg makes the others dress warmly. / Robin dabbles with magic ignoring Ravens warning that he will anger the magic god. / When Robin gets frustrated with the Titans disobedience he turns to...puppets. / After Starfire is set up by Blackfire and sent to prison the Titans work to make Blackfire a better sister while Starfire plots her revenge. / When Robin Booty Scootys his butt off, the Titans must go on an adventure to recover the lost booty.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. The Tea Timers throw a dance and invite everyone in the Creek, but while JP and Maney get ready together, Craig believes that the party is a ruse to get back at him as revenge. Meanwhile, Aaron asks out Kelsey and she reluctantly accepts - while Aaron is nice, Kelsey does not want to hurt his feelings as she is not romantically in love with him.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. The Stump Kids come across an underground bunker made of cardboard and courtesy of Carter Brown - recruiting Zoe, they head down and discover that Carter has been trying to make up for his past misdeeds by bettering himself. However, this involves transforming himself into a "card-borg" and attacking his former allies in an induced rage.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. While out on their usual exploration, the Stump Kids find a hidden underground bunker called Founders Keep and deduce that it belonged to the first group of kids to play in the Creek from as far back as 1976. As they find it strange that the kids would leave their things behind, Craig discovers a letter written in secret code that might explain their abandoned hideout.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated by her family, Nicole strikes up a friendship with a sympathetic AI. As their relationship intensifies, the AI tries to drive a wedge between Nicole and the other Wattersons.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball must find a way to save his relationship with Darwin after the boys are forced to live in separate rooms.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: After lamenting her many chores on the MWB, Lana inadvertently swaps bodies with her luxury-loving nemesis Horatious Hoffenstance, and gets to live his lavish lifestyle. However, as Horatious discovers the joys of Lanas loyal friends and family, Lana quickly learns that Horatiouss seemingly perfect life on the Golden Goose isnt all its cracked up to be.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is on a crucial quest to transport an ice sculpture of Admiral Lovejoy to a celebration for her in Weymouth, when the figurehead of the Mighty Windbreaker breaks off and is lost at sea. Unfortunately for Lana, this triggers Andar and the crews superstitious phobia of sailing without a figurehead, putting Lanas quest and the Mighty Windbreaker in great peril.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. At Halloween show and tell the class isnt buying Gumballs story about Gargaroth The Devourer until Carrie fakes a terrifying haunting. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators and take their payment in Halloween candy. But when it turns out Gargaroth is real suddenly Gumball is expected to be the towns saviour.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice hes about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover theyre travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and in the process allows them to finally go their separate ways…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball vows to wear a shell and partake in strange Fitzgerald traditions, in order to help Penny get through a tense family birthday party with ease.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin seek healthy food for their family, but an evil food consortium controls the industry.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High. / Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Raven and Beast Boy are shocked to discover that their exes Terra and Aqualad are now dating each other. / Robin uses a prism to split each Titan into the five facets of their personalities so he can choose only the best parts for his ideal crime fighting team. / The Titans negative behavior is giving superheroes a bad name, so they must learn proper conduct to be good role models for kids. / Robin starts working at an ice cream shop to get revenge on Jokers Gelato for denying him a free birthday scoop.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai the blue jay and Rigby the raccoon hate having to do work as groundskeepers at the local park, trying to slack off whenever they can. When they have simple problems to solve, they often lead to a surreal, extreme, and often supernatural misadventures. Usually this makes their boss, Benson (a gumball machine) extremely angry and on the verge to fire them and annoys their coworker, Skips (a yeti, voiced by Mark Hamill). The pair are always saved by the other manager/owner Pops (a man with a lollipop-shaped head) as he enjoys their constant antics. Co-workers Muscle-Man (an overweight, green man) and Hi-Five Ghost sometimes get involved in the shenanigans, but usually find a way out and leave Mordecai and Rigby in the firing line.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Richard has lost all of the familys money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Rob creates a variety of spinoff Elmore shows and formats in order to replace Gumball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad misses a package and is forced into an escalating feud with the delivery guy. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. / Gumball and Darwin have to stop Alan from becoming Class President of Elmore Junior High. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny amazing sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate Gumball makes sure that he covers every aspect of the skating lifestyle - from wearing the right gear using the right terms and choosing the right board. But when Darwin finally gets his wheels rolling he realises there might be one important aspect of skating that Gumball hasnt taught him...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the Wattersons internet cuts out, they have to adapt to a world without it. / Gumball decides to make some changes when an online personality test tells him that hes "The Loser". / Rocky is trying to find love with the help of the latest dating app… / Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts safely. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules they realise they must be much clearer.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. When Craig accidentally destroys Kits entire supply of red velvet Chocorolls, he has to pay her back by making trades for her throughout the day. He must first sell some lame headgear, then get a certain sour snack from the Ninja Kids for the Elders, and finally get a very bland granola bar from the Junk Lord... or rather, his wild junk cats.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: On her 12th birthday, Lana looks forward to embarking on a life of adventure with her legendary father, only for Andar to hang up his war-hammer and retire to spend more time with her on sleepy Shediac. Undeterred, Lana follows her dream to join the Guild on his ship, finding odd allies and antagonists along the way, including her own dad.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: With Andars frustration growing after a series of failed quests, Lana hatches a plan to stage a sure-fire victory for the Mighty Windbreaker. Little does she know, her fake mission will inadvertently awaken zombie skeletons, turning her ruse into a dangerous reality.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: After tasting Masamis gourmet, double-truffle mac-n-cheese at lunch, Gumball decides to do whatever it takes to get a full serving of the delicious meal.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: We finally learn the true source of the Titans goofy humor: pizza. / Cyborg wants to have an 80s TV show marathon but the remote is missing. / Robin tries to teach The Titans to respect money but he ends up bee-ing the one who learns the lesson. / Rose Wilson escapes from prison defeating the Titans with cool one liners. Only Raven is immune to Roses insults and the two decide to hang out and do cool stuff together.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai and Rigby are slacking off again, this time with a stick hockey table. Benson finds out and makes a deal with the two if they finish all their work, they can play stick hockey. However, Benson goes against his word and sells the stick hockey table to a thrift store, who sells it to a pawn shop. Mordecai and Rigby set out to retrieve the stick hockey table, and end up in a stick hockey tournament. Benson feels guilty about lying, so he goes over to the tournament, where he finds a beat-up Mordecai and Rigby. Benson comes out to face an old rival named Chong who had killed his friend (another gumball machine). Its up to Benson to avenge his friend and save Mordecai and Rigby from Chong.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai the blue jay and Rigby the raccoon hate having to do work as groundskeepers at the local park, trying to slack off whenever they can. When they have simple problems to solve, they often lead to a surreal, extreme, and often supernatural misadventures. Usually this makes their boss, Benson (a gumball machine) extremely angry and on the verge to fire them and annoys their coworker, Skips (a yeti, voiced by Mark Hamill). The pair are always saved by the other manager/owner Pops (a man with a lollipop-shaped head) as he enjoys their constant antics. Co-workers Muscle-Man (an overweight, green man) and Hi-Five Ghost sometimes get involved in the shenanigans, but usually find a way out and leave Mordecai and Rigby in the firing line.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Darwin wants to get back a love letter he wrote to Carrie before she sees it.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin use Mollys time-halting power (because shes so boring) to avoid an after school beatdown by Tina.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: What We Know with Max Foster
programme.desc: Max Foster has a definitive roundup of the days top stories, giving you the urgent need-to-know context, plus a deeper dive into the questions sparking debate around the world.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Magazino. Current affairs show with Abby Phillip.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Magazino. Current affairs show.

programme.title: The Story Is: With Elex Michaelson
programme.desc: Elex Michaelson tackles the breaking stories making headlines with sharp analysis, fresh perspective, and a dose of humor.

programme.title: Smerconish
programme.desc: Michael Smerconish tackles the American political and news stories of the week, offering only one kind of talking point: his own.

programme.title: The Amanpour Hour
programme.desc: Christiane Amanpour, CNNs chief international anchor, brings valuable insight to the biggest global and domestic news stories of the week.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Saturday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Saturday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Saturday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: Smerconish
programme.desc: Michael Smerconish tackles the American political and news stories of the week, offering only one kind of talking point: his own.

programme.title: CNN This Morning Weekend
programme.desc: Start your day with Victor Blackwell and Amara Walker bringing you the latest headlines and analysis.

programme.title: Inside Politics
programme.desc: Inside Politics is a political talk show, broadcast on CNN and anchored by CNN Chief National Correspondent John King. It features the most important political stories presented by a panel of well-sourced reporters. John King is an experienced reporter who covers the White House, Congress and the campaign trail, and interviews presidents, politicians and voters.

programme.title: U.S. State of the Union Address
programme.desc: The Speech is addressed to the Congress and the American people. It aims to highlight administration work and its victories, target political enemies and demonstrate the Presidents vision for the whole country.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.title: Inside Politics
programme.desc: Inside Politics is a political talk show, broadcast on CNN and anchored by CNN Chief National Correspondent John King. It features the most important political stories presented by a panel of well-sourced reporters. John King is an experienced reporter who covers the White House, Congress and the campaign trail, and interviews presidents, politicians and voters.

programme.title: Late Night Lockup
programme.desc: In Wisconsin, officers engage in a late-night pursuit. In Washington, a drunk driver causes a crash. Police deal with an unruly woman in Florida.

programme.title: High Speed Chase
programme.desc: The reckless driver of an 18-wheeler wreaks havoc in Texas. Plus, a man goes on the run after allegedly stabbing a doctor in Florida.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.title: Late Night Lockup
programme.desc: An intoxicated man falls asleep at a drive-thru in New Mexico. A police horse pursues a gun-toting felon around in New Orleans.

programme.title: Late Night Lockup
programme.desc: In Wisconsin, officers engage in a late-night pursuit. In Washington, a drunk driver causes a crash. Police deal with an unruly woman in Florida.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Asphalt Cowboys
programme.desc: Hauling a heavy load in gigantic trucks is no joke, and this reality series follows truckers, also known as asphalt cowboys, as they earn their money transporting heavy goods across the European continent. Battling the elements, strict time constraints, and the loneliness of being away from home, these truckers fire up their engines and waste no time on the road, ensuring their clients goods arrive on time and in one piece!

programme.title: Overhaulin
programme.desc: Overhaulin is an American reality TV series about customizing cars. The main difference from the other shows of this type is detailed presentation of the technical process and import scene plus serious-minded approach to the car owners needs. The hosts are Chip Foose and Chris Jacobs. The concept of the series is that the car owner is absolutely unaware of whats going on. His car disappears one day and the owner is convinced that it has been stolen, misplaced or lost at a mechanics shop, or has been towed away by police. Chip Foose and a team of mechanics have a week to remake the car into a custom masterpiece. Each show ends up with the surprise reuniting of the owner and his customized baby on four wheels.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Mike Whiteside and Robert Kulp are the hosts of Salvage Dawgs show that is about saving beautiful old things from buildings planned to be torn down. They and their talented crew teach the viewers how to repurpose old stuff into something new and useful instead of throwing it away. So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.

programme.title: Dude, Youre Screwed
programme.desc: Unique, adrenaline-filled docu-reality series that follows five unprepared survivalists who are dropped into some of the worlds harshest environments, and they must make their way back to civilisation within 100 hours. Meet Green Beret Terry Schappert, primitive survival expert Matt Graham, former Navy SEAL Jake Zweig, Army veteran Tom Moore and RAF survival expert John Hudson. In each episode, one of them is captured by surprise, blindfolded and dropped to some remote location around the world by his fellow survivalists. He has 100 hours to find his way back, using only the survival kit that contains some useful, but also some more unusual items. Participant wears a biometric belt, which allows the team to determine if he gets into a critical condition, and if that happens he is disqualified and automatically loses the game.

programme.title: Dual Survival
programme.desc: Hosts Cody Lundin and Dave Canterbury are on a deserted island off the coast of Nova Scotia in the dead of winter. They use items from their life raft to show how to survive.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: A serial killers descendant tells the truth about his death. Are the mafia and government co-conspirators? Did the last Romanov truly escape death?

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates studies the vanishing of the 16th-century inhabitants of Roanoke, the purported discovery of the city of Sodom, and Stonehenges secrets.

programme.title: Mystery Of Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Locals say that Bling Frog Ranch in Utah is a cursed land, a place that should not been interfered with, a place where strange things just seem to happen. Rumours have long circulated about a lost treasure hidden somewhere on the ranch, and that the mysterious land is trying to hold on to something. This reality series follows Duane Ollinger as he throws everything he has at finding its hidden treasures, but every time he thinks he close, another peculiar incident arises.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Trading scrap metal is like playing the stock market. From a small collection point, scrap metal goes a long way to collect and segregate before it reaches the furnace. The steel mills order batches of appropriately selected and prepared raw materials in a specified quantity and time. To trade scrap metal, you must have the ability to do business as well as luck. This program invites you to meet people who work in scrap yards all over Poland.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: Junk Gypsies
programme.desc: Docusoap that follows two sisters, designers and owners of a company called Junk Gypsy Co. based in Round Top, Texas - Amie and Jolie Sikes, who go to various flea markets and hunt for junk that they can turn into high-end decor, which they use to transform homes of their clients. These unique women, whose clientele includes country music stars and Hollywood actors, and have a large and passionate social media fan base, find beauty and value in items that would otherwise end up in the trash.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Jared Douglas attempts to harvest the planets biggest, most valuable trees. But getting these giants from the forest to market could kill him.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: To make up for lost profits, Jared takes a huge gamble on bringing two valuable pieces of machinery back to life after decades of neglect.

programme.title: American Loggers
programme.desc: Record rainfall has left the Pelletiers hustling to make up for lost time, when two monster log hauling trucks collide. When will their luck improve?

programme.title: Extreme Vacation Homes
programme.desc: Miami, Barbados, Hamptons. Explore unique holiday homes, from crazy ski chalets to heavenly Hamptons hideaways. And, meet the owners and architects behind the creations.

programme.title: Extreme Vacation Homes
programme.desc: Italy, Washington, Grenada. From a 50-million-dollar villa in the Tuscan hills to a high-tech Washington state hideaway, take a closer look at some of the worlds most extreme vacation homes.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.desc: Captivating docu-reality series in which Rebecca Budig shows viewers some of the worlds most amazing, luxurious and extraordinary water featured homes. You will have a chance to see what happens when you combine creativity, ingenuity and lots and lots of water when she takes us on a tour of cool properties such as a private water parks, islands and lakes, luxury houseboats and yachts with every amenity imaginable including a private crew.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: Homes vanish underwater, residents cling to rooftops, and rescuers battle rising floods in Floridas deadliest hurricane in nearly 100 years.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: The ladies of Vegas put the tow drivers to the test: Pineapple fends off a busload of bachelorettes, and Kyle has an encounter with a showgirl.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: Its a race for the most tows as fans descend on Las Vegas for the F1 Grand Prix. TW subdues a raunchy party while Shawn confronts a racegoer.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: Niklas talks to a man who really doesnt remember how many units of alcohol he is bringing. Tomas takes the time to teach a lesson at Arlanda.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Zenith - Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: Zenith - Advances in Space Exploration reveals these latest developments and the implications they hold for all of us.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The ESA - JAXA joint Bepi-Colombo Mission is moments away from launch. The target is Mercury which has been too long neglected; this mission will shed new light on this strange world of light and dark.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample. The return of asteroid material to Earth will aid scientists in the evolving asteroid planetary defense systems.

programme.title: Depleted Uranium, A Very Presentable Killer
programme.desc: More than 50 countries now possess weapons based on depleted uranium (DU). Experimentation has been rife, and the consequences for civilians and the military alike have been dramatic. This investigation compares and contrasts the arguments of those who defend and attack a technology that is highly toxic. For 20 years, scientists, doctors, veterans and activists have denounced the use of DU. Against them are the arms industry lobbyists and nuclear authorities who continue to minimise the risks. Through archive documents, interviews and in situ investigations, accompanied by key witnesses (victims, experts...) we aim to present a clearer picture of the issues and stakes linked to the use of DU. Quick-paced, with a sense of urgency, the film underlines the essential background and conflicting viewpoints, enabling viewers to make up their own minds about a subject that concerns us all.

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: After American troops liberated Wiltz, Luxembourg in 1944, the townspeople were finally able to celebrate Saint Nicholas Day again after five years of Nazi occupation. Soldiers from the 28th Infantry Division organized a special event for the children, with Corporal Richard Brookins playing Saint Nick, riding in a jeep and handing out treats. Just ten days later, the Battle of the Bulge began, and the soldiers left Wiltz. Grateful for their kindness, the town began an annual "American St. Nick" celebration in 1947, retracing Brookins route. Brookins only learned of this tradition in 1977, when he was invited back and honored as a hero.

programme.title: The Boy From the Wild
programme.desc: Growing up on a Game Reserve meant to help wildlife get out of captivity, it shares how it began and how Peter Meyer survived some incredible moments in the wild.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Hoylake and investigate a building known as The Parade. Dating back to 1909, this once former school, still seems to have ghostly pupils and teachers taking class.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Blackpool Pleasure Beach is one of the most visited attractions in the United Kingdom. People visit it not only for the fun, but to also hopefully catch a glimpse of the many ghosts that haunt there.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were exploring the other side New York state in Buffalo and Niagara. Well take the oath of office like Teddy, at the Roosevelt inauguration site in Buffalo. Then, well take a tour of the Frank Lloyd Wright Martin house and learn about Americas most celebrated architect. We get soaked on the Maid of the Mist at breathtaking Niagara Falls, and defend the walls at Fort Niagara.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Amboseli National Park has had several years of drought so were anxious to see if the famous elephant herds are healthy. Journeys takes to the air and ground to get a count of these incredible animals. Along the way, we visit the local Masai to see how theyre adjusting to encroaching civilization and we encounter buffalo, hippos and numerous bird species that make Amboseli so special.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This under-visited, and far western Kenyan park area, is renowned for its giant flamingo gatherings that literally turn lakes pink. We explore these many parks on foot, in a safari vehicle and on horseback searching out the local legends that have marked this region the death zone. Our host faces imminent doom in three unique parks in this fast-paced episode.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Two brothers from rural China train in the art of Kung Fu in the hopes of elevating their lives however minimally. Meanwhile, rich kids in the city attend private English schools to improve their chances to study abroad. But Chinas favorite philanthropist Chen Guang Biao shares his rags-to-riches story proving that odds can indeed be beaten. Rural children in China may still dream small, but as for the young elite partying away in rooftop bars, life is sweet.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Travel Thru History is an Emmy-nominated, un-hosted lifestyle/travel series designed to spark interest and enthusiasm in viewers about our worlds rich and fascinating history by traveling to diverse locales across the globe. Locations include New Orleans, Las Vegas, Oslo, Belize, Dublin and more. In this episode we visit the Kennedy Space Center located on Floridas famous "Space Coast." Well speak to NASA engineers about the past, present and future of American space travel, as well as take a look at the attractions KSC has to offer.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We visit the old south and enjoy some sweet tea in Savannah. On this episode, well stroll the citys beautiful squares, as well as visit its civil war past at Old Fort Jackson. Then, we head up the stairs of the famous Tybee Island lighthouse and visit the Savannah Railroad museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.
