programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Найду пару любимому
programme.desc: Увлекательная мелодрама о романтической истории отношений двух кондитеров, влюбленных в свое дело. Главные роли сыграли Антонина Хижняк и Антон Денисенко. Надежда — виртуоз в создании незабываемых вкусов и оригинальных дизайнов свадебных тортов. Вокруг нее всегда бурлит жизнь, а она — эпицентр этой жизни. Но, кроме любви к кондитерскому искусству, у Нади есть талант объединять одинокие сердца. А вот Виктор — сдержанный, справедливый и зачастую скептически настроенный к экспериментам. Начинается настоящее состязание, когда Виктор узнает, что его коллега, помимо взращивания теста, помогает создавать семьи. Он считает Надю аферисткой и дамочкой с неустроенной личной жизнью. Надежда же предлагает ему пари: она найдет ему вторую половинку, иначе он станет главным технологом на фабрике. Но насколько они разные? Возможны ли чувства после вспышек неприязни? И как отыскать пару тому, в кого давно влюблен?

programme.title: Найду пару любимому

programme.title: Жених
programme.desc: Главный герой безумно любит свою жену, красавицу. Она же постоянно изменяет ему и… рожает почти каждый год по ребенку.. Всех детей Валера растит как родных. Он им и отец, и мать. Однажды Люся исчезает из дому вовсе, встретив "новую любовь"- иностранца… В тот же год с Голубевым случается горе… Как сложится судьба одинокого многодетного отца и его малышей? Что станет с беспутной мамашей на чужбине? Это история любви, предательства, прощения, а еще — преодоления себя.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Любовь с ароматом кофе
programme.desc: Красавица Аля – мать-одиночка, работает баристой и воспитывает 5-ти летнего сына. Бывший парень бросил ее одну с ребенком. Девушка долго никого не подпускала к себе, пока не встретила мажора Гошу. И впервые за долгое время подумала, что он ― тот мужчина, с которым можно шагать по жизни легко и просто. Но Гоша бросает девушку. В это время Аля встречает друга Гоши Костю, который предлагает ей сделку: сыграть роль его несносной, бесцеремонной невесты, чтобы семья перестала думать о женитьбе Кости. Но все идет не по плану….

programme.title: Жить ради любви
programme.desc: Это история о том, как ошибки молодости могут повлиять на всю дальнейшую жизнь.

programme.title: Одинок по контракту
programme.desc: Фильм расскажет историю молодой восходящей звезды Славы Лебедева, фронтмена рок-группы "Сердце города", и юной Лили Фиалко, которая влюбляется в Славу, не подозревая о его популярности. Проблема заключается в том, что по контракту Славе нельзя не только жениться, но и встречаться с девушкой, чтобы не разрушить свой сценический образ и не лишиться любви фанаток.

Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? programme.title: Cleanskin
programme.desc: Thriller. Thriller, produced in 2012. Co-produced by the USA and the UK. A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.

programme.title: The Flock
programme.desc: This film is about a hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety who, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl who he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: Absentia
programme.desc: Tricias husband Daniel has been missing for seven years. Her younger sister Callie comes to live with her as the pressure mounts to finally declare him "dead in absentia." As Tricia sifts through the wreckage and tries to move on with her life, Callie finds herself drawn to an ominous tunnel near the house. As she begins to link it to other mysterious disappearances, it becomes clear that Daniels presumed death might be anything but "natural." The ancient force at work in the tunnel might have set its sights on Callie and Tricia ... and Daniel might be suffering a fate far worse than death in its grasp.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: The story of Ben Sweet (Nick Roth), an eighteen-year-old middle-class man who enrolls at the University of California, Berkeley, in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There, he plunges into a life of sex, drugs, and rock n roll, as well as political activism that turns his conservative world upside down and sets him on a path of self-discovery.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: In 1941 China under the Japanese rule, Ma Yuan is forced to work in railroad construction used for transferring Japanese equipment. He decides together with a team of rebels to sabotage a military train with heavy weaponry.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: Rosie, a divorced mother, lives with her daughter in LA. But her life is not exactly ideal. The tv show she has been working on seems doomed. Her ex-husband just had a baby with a younger woman, while her daughter has started dating boys!

programme.title: Digging Into China
programme.desc: Harriet, a ten-year old girl, lives together with her big sister and her alcoholic mother out in the countryside. The family runs a motel. Harriet is different from the others, as she owns a great creativity and has nobody to play with. Her infinite world exists only in her mind. One day, Ricky comes along. He is a grown-up, but retarded son of an elderly lady. Soon, Harriet and Ricky share their experiences of life from a different point of view and become close friends. But his mother still plans to give Ricky away into professional care in a home, because she wont live forever to be there for him.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: David Lowerys crime biopic stars Robert Redford as Forrest Tucker, a real-life bank robber who found himself wanted by police across the United States for a string of prison escapes and robberies. We first meet Tucker in the early 80s. Hes 74 and has been evading police for two years since his last audacious prison break. But hes not taking things easy and laying low. Thats not his bag. This suave old geezer has a somehow enamouring way of walking into a bank, charmingly informing the teller that he has a gun that he doesnt want to use, and walking out with a big old sack of cash. In fact, hes just done exactly that when he meets Jewel (Sissy Spacek), an enchanting farmer who he quickly trusts so much that he decides to reveal to her his true identity. Tucker, alongside spending time on Jewels farm enjoying her more simplistic way of life, embarks on a string of heists. On the case is local detective John Hunt (Casey Affleck), and Tucker soon finds himself torn between the peaceful life hes enjoyed with Jewel and his old criminal ways. Also starring Danny Glover and Tom Waits.

programme.title: Looks That Kill
programme.desc: This is the story of sixteen-year-old Max as he deals with the ups and downs of being lethally attractive.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: During the Korean War, General MacArthur sends a spy team on a covert operation to a command center of the North Korean army. The plan: to obtain intel to prepare for the invasion of the port of Incheon.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: A black police officer gets pushed to the edge after he is profiled and assaulted by the colleagues he worked side by side with, so he decides to get revenge and take his frustrations out on the community that he swore to protect.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: McCinseys Island
programme.desc: A former secret agent finds a treasure map and decides to find the loot. But he is not the only one.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Con Man
programme.desc: The story of Barry Minkow, a young charismatic business man who becomes a wealthy CEO by lying, cheating and stealing his way to the top.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A 30-something man decides to marry his pregnant girlfriend and asks his four best friends to stand with him at the wedding, but as he observes his friends relationship troubles, he wrestles with issues of fatherhood, marriage and growing up.

programme.title: The Good Girl
programme.desc: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.Justine is a sullen 30-year-old woman stuck in a dead-end job at the Retail Rodeo department store.In addition to her mind-numbing occupation, Justine also has to contend with her dim-witted husband, Phil, and his partner, Bubba, who work as house painters when they arent smoking pot and staring blankly at the television.Justine sees an opportunity for change, however, when she meets Holden, a fellow Retail Rodeo employee who is even more depressed than herself.The young Holden and Justine soon begin a passionate secret affair, unaware that it may not be so secret after all.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: The great Wesley Snipes (Blade himself!) stars as "The Hunter" in this Mauro Borrelli (The Ghostmaker) directed film. The Recall also stars RJ Mitte (Breaking Bad), Jedidiah Goodacre (Descendants), Niko Pepaj (Awkward), Laura Maria Bilgeri (Toby Goes to Camp) and Hannah Rose May (Ballers). The movie tells the tale of five friends vacationing at a remote lake house, expecting nothing less than a good time. Unbeknownst to them, Earth is under an alien invasion and in the thralls of a mass-abduction. Director Borelli is a former collaborator of director Tim Burton and the film illustrator for blockbuster films such as Pirates of the Caribbean and Captain America. The Recall will also be shot for the new Barco Escape three-screen, panoramic theatrical format, which fully surrounds audiences and offers the ultimate immersive cinema experience. Portions of the films will also be shot in Virtual Reality.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hannai ir tikai 16 gadu, bet spēkos, izturībā un attapībā viņa var mēroties ar specvienības kareivi. Hanna dziļos Somijas mežos uzaugusi kopā ar tēvu, ar nemitīgiem treniņiem un izturības pārbaudēm viņš tīņu meiteni ir izaudzinājis par perfektu slepkavu.

programme.title: Sadedzināt pēc izlasīšanas
programme.desc: CIP aģents pēc atlaišanas no darba raksta memuārus. Viņa sieva, kura ierosinājusi laulības šķiršanu, slepus iekopējusi diskā pierakstus un iedevusi advokātei, lai viņa atrastu ko kompromitējošu. Taču advokāte nejauši atstāj disku sporta zāles sieviešu ģērbtuvē, kur darbinieki to atrod. Pieņemot, ka disks satur ārkārtīgi slepenu informāciju, viņi nolemj informāciju pārdot.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Pavasara krāsas.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Valts Kovalskis ir tikko zaudējis savu sievu un viņa bērni vēlas ievietot savu tēvu veco ļaužu pansionātā. Būdams ass, cinisks un nekomunukabls, Valts slikti sadzīvo ar aziātu izcelsmes kaimiņiem, pret kuriem Korejas kara veterāns neslēpj savus rasistiskos uzskatus.

programme.title: Sadedzināt pēc izlasīšanas

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Valts Kovalskis ir tikko zaudējis savu sievu un viņa bērni vēlas ievietot savu tēvu veco ļaužu pansionātā. Būdams ass, cinisks un nekomunukabls, Valts slikti sadzīvo ar aziātu izcelsmes kaimiņiem, pret kuriem Korejas kara veterāns neslēpj savus rasistiskos uzskatus.

programme.title: Valkīra
programme.desc: Otrā pasaules kara laikā grupa vācu armijas virsnieku izstrādā plānu, lai nogalinātu Ādolfu Hitleru un pieliktu punktu karam. 1944.gada 20. jūlijā aristokrātu izcelsmes virsnieks Klauss fon Štaufenbergs portfelī ienes spridzekli Hitlera slepenajā mītnē. Atstājis to, viņš dzird nograndam sprādzienu. Tomēr atentāts ir neveiksmīgs. Hitlers gūst vien pāris nenozīmīgus ievainojumus. Pāris dienu laikā sazvērestības dalībnieki tiek arestēti. Lomās: Toms Krūzs, Kenets Brana, Bils Najs u.c.

programme.title: Oušena ducis
programme.desc: Ir pagājuši trīs gadi, kopš Denijs Oušens un viņa banda ar kāršu blēdi, kabatzagli, seifu uzlauzēju un spridzināšanas ekspertu priekšgalā paveica nekaunīgāko un ienesīgāko aplaupīšanu, aptīrot triju Lasvegasas kazino īpašnieku Teriju Benediktu. Nolaupītie 160 miljoni ir sadalīti, un Oušena banda centusies uzsākt godīgu dzīvi. Tomēr Terijs Benedikts kāro atgūt sev nozagto naudu un atriebties, tāpēc mierīga dzīve nebūs nevienam. Piedevām Oušena bandai uz pēdām ir ne tikai Terijs. Galvenajās lomās: Džordžs Klūnijs, Breds Pits, Džūlija Robertsa.

programme.title: Džons Viks 3: Parabellum
programme.desc: Profesionālais slepkava Džons Viks ir nogalinājis slepenas starptautiskas slepkavu ģildes biedru un tagad ir spiests bēguļot. Par viņa galvu ir izsolīta 14 miljonu dolāru liela atlīdzība, un viņam pēdas dzen pasaules nežēlīgākie un prasmīgākie slepkavas.

programme.title: Meklēju draugu pasaules galam
programme.desc: Uzzinot par to, ka cilvēces pēdējie mēģinājumi apturēt gigantisko, Zemei tuvojošos asteroīdu ir izgāzušies, Dodžs (Karels) dodas savā pēdējā ceļojumā. Viņš grib sameklēt savu seno mīlestību, lai atklātu savas jūtas pirms pasaulei ir pienācis gals. Palīdzēt Dodžam viņa neparastajā misijā apņemas kaimiņiene Penija (Naitlija), kas tikko izšķīrusies no sava drauga-egoista. Kamēr varoņi tuvojas savam mērķim, pa ceļam vērojot nolemtās cilvēces trakulības, starp viņiem pilnīgi nevietā uzplaukst romantiskas attiecības.

Pirmais pasaules karš, Rietumu fronte, diviem jauniem britu kareivjiem tiek dots praktiski neizpildāms uzdevums - nokļūt ienaidnieka aizmugurē, lai nogādātu ziņojumu, kas ļautu izglābt ievērojamu skaitu kareivju no drošas nāves.

programme.title: Džokers
programme.desc: Arturs Fleks ir vīrs, kurš cenšas atrast savu vietu pilsētas sašķeltajā sabiedrībā. Viņš savu savu ikdienu pavada, skatoties Mureja Franklina šovu un sapņojot, ka kādu reizi pats tajā piedalīsies. Diemžēl Artūram piemīt uzvedības traucējumi, kuru dēļ viņš sāk smieties un nespēj apstāties, līdz ir nomierinājies, tādēļ viņš mēdz iekļūt neveiklās situācijās. Dienā strādājot par klaunu gadījuma darbos, bet vakaros cenšoties kļūt par atzītu komiķi, viņš nonāk pie atziņas, ka izjokots tiek viņš pats. Ierauts vienladzības un nežēlības cilkliskajā esamībā, Arturs pieņem vienu sliktu lēmumu, kas uzsāk ķēdes reakciju viņa transformācijā par Džokeru.

programme.title: Meklēju draugu pasaules galam
programme.desc: Uzzinot par to, ka cilvēces pēdējie mēģinājumi apturēt gigantisko, Zemei tuvojošos asteroīdu ir izgāzušies, Dodžs (Karels) dodas savā pēdējā ceļojumā. Viņš grib sameklēt savu seno mīlestību, lai atklātu savas jūtas pirms pasaulei ir pienācis gals. Palīdzēt Dodžam viņa neparastajā misijā apņemas kaimiņiene Penija (Naitlija), kas tikko izšķīrusies no sava drauga-egoista. Kamēr varoņi tuvojas savam mērķim, pa ceļam vērojot nolemtās cilvēces trakulības, starp viņiem pilnīgi nevietā uzplaukst romantiskas attiecības.

programme.desc: Pastaiga sniegotā purvā

programme.title: Mērija un Makss
programme.desc: 1976. gadā Melburnā vientuļa astoņgadīga meitene uzsāk saraksti ar neparastu vēstuļu draugu - smagi aptaukojušos 44 gadus vecu ņujorkieti ar Aspergera sindromu.

programme.title: Visa pasaules nauda
programme.desc: Kad sešpadsmitgadīgais Džons Pols Getijs III tiek nolaupīts, viņa izmisusī māte Geila lūdz jaunekļa vectēvu, naftas magnātu, samaksāt izpirkumu. Kad miljardieris Getijs atsakās, Geila visiem spēkiem mēģina viņu pārliecināt, jo dēla nolaupītāji kļūst arvien brutālāki. Kamēr zēna dzīvība karājas mata galā, negaidīti par Geilas sabiedroto šajā cīņā kļūst Getija konsultants Flečers Čeiss, bijušais CIP darbinieks.

programme.title: Garšīgi
programme.desc: Francija, 1789. gads, īsi pirms revolūcijas. Ar pārsteidzoši talantīgas jaunas sievietes palīdzību pavārs, kuru atlaidis viņa dižciltīgais saimnieks, atrod spēku atbrīvoties no kalpa amata un atver pirmo restorānu pasaulē.

programme.title: 20. gadsimta sievietes
programme.desc: Trīs sievietes, trīs stāsti, trīs likteņi - triju paaudžu ekrāna dīvas Anete Beninga, Elle Faninga un Grēta Gērviga dzīvā un optimistiskā stāstā par sievietēm pagājušā gadsimta 70-to gadu Kalifornijā.

programme.title: Draudzīgais stāsts
programme.desc: Harmonija starp četriem draugiem un diviem pāriem tiek apdraudēta, kad Lea uzraksta romānu, kas kļūst par bestselleru.

programme.title: Marija Antuanete
programme.desc: Kad Austrijā dzimušo Mariju Antuaneti 14 gadu vecumā izprecina Francijas princim Luijam Ogistam, lai nostiprinātu Francijas un Austrijas savienību, viņai atņem visu, kas viņai ir dārgs. Marija Antuanete savu vīru reti satiek ārpus abu oficiālajām pieņemšanām. Abi guļ vienā gultā septiņus gadus, taču laulība netiek īstenota. Tas ļoti apbēdina Antuanetes māti un Luija tēvu, kuri izmisīgi vēlas Francijas troņmantnieku. Kad Marija Antuanete kļūst par karalieni un sāk iztukšot valsts karalisko kasi personīgo iegribu apmierināšanai, viņa sāk zaudēt cilvēku labvēlību.

programme.title: Tālu no trokšņainā pūļa
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Anglijā neatkarīgā un stūrgalvīgā Batšeba Everdena ir lepna un skaista sieviete, kura piesaista triju dažādiem sabiedrības slāņiem piederošu vīriešu uzmanību. Pēc Batšebas tikšanās ar aitu fermas īpašnieku Gabriēlu Ouku pārgalvīgo seržantu Frensisu Troju un turīgo vecpuisi Viljamu Boldvudu, viņu dzīves vairs nekad nebūs tādas, kā iepriekš.

programme.title: Tāda ir mīlestība
programme.desc: Mīlestība ir visapkārt... Šī ir filma par mīlestību, kurā risinās vairāki savstarpēji nesaistīti stāsti. Filmas varoņi iemīlas, un šķiras, skumst un priecājas. Kaut arī viņi dzīvo atšķirīgas dzīves, kautkas viņus visus vieno... Tāda ir mīlestība.

programme.title: Pasaulēm tālu
programme.desc: Kamēr Dienvideiropu plosa sociālekonomiskās nemieri, mūsdienu Grieķijā risinās trīs atšķirīgi stāsti. Katrs no tiem atspoguļo atšķirīgu grieķu paaudzi, kas iemīlējusies ārzemniekā, un katrs stāsts galu galā saplūst kopā, veidojot vienotu veselumu.

programme.title: Tālu no trokšņainā pūļa

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Cupcake Championship
programme.desc: Four cupcake connoisseurs battle it out in this cooking competition series, hoping to prove they are the supreme cupcake bakers and take home the $10,000 prize. Each of these contestants are undoubtedly talented cupcake designers, but there can only be one winner, and the heat is on to showcase their artistry and flair when it comes to baking these little sweet treats. Hosted by Kardea Brown, the show give the bakers new challenges to complete in each episode, with the poorest performing contestant eliminated at each stage of the competition, resulting in a final showdown between the very best.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood City Bakes is hosted by the British most loved baker, Paul Hollywood, who explores 10 cities around the globe. He is looking for the family bakeries, corner delis and luxury hotels which have created the baking heritage of entire cities. From Cape Town to Reykjavik, Paul will personally guide into the tastiest baking to be found there, each cities own culture and unique history. Exploring the sights of each city Paul gets inspired and creates two unique recipes of his own.

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: The chefs are challenged to create layered dishes in hopes of earning control of the game. One contender takes a sweet risk to stand out.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon prepares for a barbecue encore, Cleveland style, with a classic Ohio sandwich, crunchy-creamy fries and a portable pie.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon starts the day off with breakfast in the garden. He puts a twist on French toast, perfects the omelette and serves a summery drink.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 10. Culinary show.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Quack Attack. Home cook Sean Johnson is flying high when Eddie Jackson surprises him with a duel of duck against Chef Alex Guarnaschelli.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Seafood Smackdown. Its a coastal competition when Eddie Jackson stuns home cook Chelsea Gieselmann with a seafood showdown against Chef Alex Guarnaschelli.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Mothers of the War
programme.desc: The documentary tells the stories of five women who lost their children in the war. This film is not only about grief, but also about the ability to preserve the light of memory through the little things: the heroes favorite dishes, plans, and childhood habits. "War Mothers" shows the scale of the tragedy of an entire nation through the prism of five broken but unbreakable maternal destinies.

programme.title: Nabaga radības
programme.desc: Sava nežēlīgā vīra ietekmē Bella (Emma Stouna) ir izdarījusi pašnāvību, taču ekscentrisks zinātnieks (Vilems Defo) nolemj izglābt sievieti un pārstāda viņai pašas vēl nedzimušā bērna smadzenes. Viņa aizbildniecībā Bella alkst mācīties un iepazīt dzīvi, kas Viktorijas laikmeta stingrajā sabiedrībā viņai līdz šim bijusi liegta. Kopā ar viltīgo un valdzinoši cinisko juristu Dankanu Vederbērnu viņa dodas ceļojumā pāri kontinentiem. Ceļojuma laikā Bella arvien vairāk atbrīvojas no sava laikmeta aizspriedumiem un sabiedrības ierobežojumiem.

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: Kas mani ved pie tevis
programme.desc: Džeina un Vils, izdeguši savu iepriekšējo romantisko sattiecību dēļ, satiekas kāzās, un bremzes nostrādā tikai mirkli pirms abu seksa garderobē. Viņi nolemj izstāstīt viens otram par savu pagātni, zinot, ka iespēja būt kopā ir gandrīz neticama.

programme.title: Kapteinis Fantastika
programme.desc: Viņi prot vairākas valodas un ir izglītoti dažādās zinātnēs. Viņi prot medīt un rīkoties ar ieročiem. Viņi dzīvo mežā un atrodas pilnīgā harmonijā ar dabu. Un tikai apstākļu sakritība liek viņiem pamest savu paradīzi un doties uz lielo pilsētu. Kas notiks tad, kad viņi sastapsies ar civilizāciju un nāksies izbaudīt visus modernās dzīves plusus un mīnusus?

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Baksteru ģimene pārceļas uz dzīvi citā štatā, taču 10 gadus veco Finnu biedē jaunā māja, jo viņš uzskata, ka tajā spokojas. Kamēr puisēns izliek slazdus, lai notvertu "spoku", viņa vecāki aizkavējas citā pilsētas malā, un viņš paliek mājās kopā ar māsu. Tikmēr trīs zagļi vēlas iegūt ārkārtīgi dārgu gleznu, kuru bijušais īpašnieks paslēpis slepenā telpā. Vai viņiem izdosies iegūt kāroto un uzvarēt kaujā mazo gudrinieku?

programme.title: Džūlzs
programme.desc: Jo vecāks Miltons kļūst, jo dīvaināks viņš apkārtējiem šķiet. Ne gluži bīstams vai atbaidošs - taču pietiekami neparasts, lai pilsētiņas iedzīvotāji viņu neuztvertu nopietni. Tāpēc neviens, izņemot kaimiņienes Sendiju un Džoisu, Miltonam netic, kad viņš uzstāj, ka viņa dārzā avarējis NLO. Tomēr stāsts ir patiess, un citplanētiešu kuģa pilots, vārdā Džūlzs, pārceļas pie viņa uz dzīvi. Taču valdībai attiecībā uz Džūlzu ir citi plāni...

programme.title: Gudričs
programme.desc: Andija Gudriča dzīve tiek apgriezta kājām gaisā, kad viņa sieva uzsāk rehabilitācijas programmu, atstājot viņu vienu ar viņu mazajiem bērniem. Gudričs paļaujas uz Greisu, savu meitu no pirmās laulības, un galu galā kļūst par tēvu, kāds viņai nekad nav bijis.

programme.title: Misija: Izglābt tīģeri
programme.desc: Jauns supervaronis iedraudzējas ar apdraudētu tīģeri, ko sastapis piknika laikā mežā, un uzsāk drosmīgu glābšanas misiju.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Ir pagājuši pieci gadi, kopš Hiks un Nezobs veiksmīgi apvienoja pūķus un vikingus uz Berkas salas. Kamēr Astrīda, Snūģis un pārējie sacenšas pūķu sacīkstēs (kas ir salas iemītnieku mīļākais sporta veids), nešķiramie draugi iepazīst apkārtni, veidojot līdz šim neatklāto teritoriju karti un atklājot jaunas pasaules. Kārtējā piedzīvojuma laikā viņi atklāj slepenu ledus alu, kur mīt vairāki simti savvaļas pūķu un noslēpumainais Pūķu Jātnieks. Hiku un Nezobu ierauj kaujā par miera saglabāšanu pasaulē. Tagad viņiem jācīnās par to, kam viņi tic, un tikai kopīgiem spēkiem draugi spēs mainīt cilvēku un pūķu nākotni.

programme.title: Kungfu panda
programme.desc: Panda, vārdā Po, strādā nūdeļu restorānā. Viņš sapņo kļūt par slavenu kungfu meistaru, jo ir kaislīgs kungfu fans, taču Po ķermeņa apmēri īsti neatbilst šim sapnim. Un ja tā pavisam godīgi, – pandas ir slinkākie dzīvnieki visā Ķīnā. Tomēr, kad pilsētai tuvojas ienaidnieks, visu cerības balstās senā pareģojumā par kādu Po, kurš izrādīsies "izredzētais" un visus izglābs. Austrumu cīņu meistariem nāksies bruņoties ar milzu pacietību, lai slinkuma maisu Po padarītu par kungfu cīkstoni.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Singstrīta
programme.desc: Dublina, 1985. gads. Ekonomiskā krīze Īrijā arvien vairāk cilvēku iedzen bankrotā, tikmēr 15 gadus vecais Konors kopā ar brāli un māsu dzīvo pie vecākiem, kuru laulībai draud izjukšana. Lai ietaupītu naudu, Konoram nākas mainīt skolu. Tur viņš ātri vien kļūst par izstumto. Kādu dienu viņš pamana Rafīnu, kura šad tad stāv iepretim skolai, raudzīdamās tālumā un smēķēdama vienu cigareti pēc otras. Viņa ir skaista, divus gadus vecāka par Konoru, viņai ir draugs, un viņa strādā par modeli. Īsāk sakot: viņa ir gandrīz nesasniedzama. Taču Konors nav gatavs padoties un piedāvā meitenei piedalīties viņa grupas videoklipā. Rafīna piekrīt, un Konors ir panikā, jo grupas viņam nemaz nav...

programme.title: Marija
programme.desc: Marija Kallasa, pasaulē izcilākā operdziedātāja, pavada savas dzīves pēdējās dienas 1970. gadu Parīzē, saskaroties ar savu identitāti.

programme.title: Kaut tu būtu šeit
programme.desc: Jauna dāma, meklējot dzīvei uguntiņu, pavada romantisku nakti kopā ar kādu jaunekli. Atklādama, ka vīrietis ir nedziedināmi slims, sieviete apņemas palīdzēt viņam pilnvērtīgi nodzīvot pēdējās šeit atvēlētās dienas.

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Veiksmīgais advokāts ir sasniedzis savas karjeras augstāko punktu un atradis liktenīgo sievieti, ar kuru vēlas drīz precēties. Viņa mierīgo dzīvi iztraucē senas paziņas lūgums. Piekrītot šim piedāvājumam, advokātam nāksies pieņemt lēmumus, kas neatbilst viņa principiem un morāles normām. Viņš vēl nemaz nenojauš, ka, iesaistoties amorālajā narkobiznesā, viņa dzīve izmainīsies līdz nepazīšanai. Filmā piedalās krāšņs aktieru ansamblis - Maikls Fasbenders, Penelope Krusa, Kemerone Diasa, Havjers Bardems un Breds Pits.

programme.title: SKS
programme.desc: Tuvā nākotnē uz Starptautiskas kosmosa stacijas klāja valda spriedze: starp apkalpes locekļu vadības komandām uz zemes izcēlies konflikts. Gan ASV, gan krievijas astronauti saņem pavēles visiem iespējamajiem līdzekļiem pārņemt kontroli stacijā savās rokās.

programme.title: Cūka
programme.desc: Robam (Nikolass Keidžs) ir īpašs talants – viņš ir izcils šefpavārs un reiz viņš priecēja savus turīgos klientus ar lieliskiem ēdieniem. Taču, kad nomira viņa sieva, Roba dzīve sabruka. Viņš beidza karjeru un pārcēlās uz nomaļu meža namiņu. Par Roba vienīgo kompanjonu nu kļuvusi trifeļu cūka, ar kuru kopā viņš pelna iztiku, – līdz pēkšņi viņa četrkājainā draudzene tiek nozagta. Lai viņu atgūtu, Robs ir gatavs doties kaut līdz pasaules malai.

programme.title: Zirnekļtīkls
programme.desc: Astoņus gadus vecais Pīters ik vakaru savas istabas sienās dzird dīvainu klauvēšanu. Viņa vecāki Kerola un Marks apgalvo, ka pie vainas Pītera spilgtā iztēle, taču zēns ir pārliecināts: šajā mājā kaut kas nav kārtībā. Un pamazām atklājas tumšs noslēpums, ko tik cītīgi glabājuši viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Kungfu panda
programme.desc: Pandumānija turpinās! Kļuvis par varoni, panda Po nu kopā ar saviem draugiem Tīģerieni, Dzērvi, Čūsku, Pērtiķi un Dievlūdzēju aizsargā dzimto ieleju un tās iemītniekus. Taču Po mierīgajai dzīvei tiek pielikts punkts brīdī, kad uzrodas ļaundaris, kurš, liekot lietā noslēpumainu spēku, grib pakļaut Ķīnu. Pandai kopā ar draugiem būs jādodas cauri visai Ķīnai, lai uzveiktu pretinieku.

programme.title: 10 dzīvības
programme.desc: Lutināts kaķis Bekets par pašsaprotamu uzskata laimīgo lozi, kas viņam iedalīta, kopš viņu izglāba un iemīlēja Roza, labsirdīga un aizrautīga studente. Kad kaķis zaudē savu devīto dzīvību, liktenis iejaucas, lai viņu aizvestu pārmācošā piedzīvojumā.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Vikingu pusaudzis Hikaps dzīvo Berkas salā kopā ar savu valdonīgo tēvu. Kaujas ar pūķiem ir vikingu ikdiena un dzīves veids, taču Hikapu tās neaizrauj. Tā vietā viņš labprātāk nododas visvisādiem izgudrojumiem un apkārtnes iepazīšanai. Reiz kādā no saviem klejojumiem Hikaps sastop ievainotu pūķi, kuram palīdz atkal lidot. Šī sastapšanās maina abu dzīves. Un, kad pienāk iesvētību laiks – lielā iespēja kaujā ar pūķiem sevi pierādīt tēvam un visai ciltij –, Hikaps rīkojas pavisam neparasti.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 2: Atkusnis
programme.desc: Laika ziņas: Tuvākās piecas dienas ir gaidāmi lieli plūdi, kam sekos pasaules gals. Iespējams, nedēļas beigās varētu izlauzties kāds saules stariņš… Mamutam Manijam, sliņķim Sidam, zobenzobu tīģerim Djego, zobenzobu vāverei Skratam un pārējiem Ledus laikmeta iemītniekiem ir sajūta, ka viņu kūstošā pasaule sāk palikt pārāk slapja un ledus kalns, kas apdraud ieleju, tūlīt lūzīs. Taču tā nav vienīgā problēma – Manijs vairs nevēlas būt viens pats, taču ir pamatotas aizdomas, ka viņš ir pēdējais mamuts. Atkal ir jādodas ceļā, kur tiek satikta valdzinoša mamutiene (iespējams, pēdējā visā pasaulē) Elija, kuru pavada uzņēmīgs oposumu pārītis Krešs un Edijs.

programme.title: Marmelāde
programme.desc: Filma par kādu ieslodzīto, kurš ar savu veiklo kameras biedru dalās paša izdomātā krāšņā, romantiskā bankas aplaupīšanas stāstā un izbēg, apvienojoties ar savas dzīves mīlestību.

programme.title: Bildinājums
programme.desc: Ambiciozā Ņujorkas izdevniecības vadītāja Margareta ir gatavā vellata, un viņas darbinieki visi kā viens dabū no bargās priekšnieces trūkties. Īpaši smagi klājas asistentam Endrjū, kuram Margaretas dēļ nākas strādāt pat brīvdienās. Taču kādu dienu nevainojamajai Margaretas dzīvei rodas nopietns apdraudējums – uzturēšanās atļauja ASV ir beigusies un viņai draud deportācija uz dzimto Kanādu. Lai nepazaudētu prestižo darbu, viņai atliek tikai viena iespēja – likt kādam no saviem padotajiem viņu bildināt un noslēgt fiktīvas laulības. Pirmais Margaretas ceļā trāpās Endrjū.

programme.title: Grāmatu zagle
programme.desc: Filma "Grāmatu zagle", kuras pamatā ir pasaulē populārs romāns, ir stāsts par neparastu, enerģisku meiteni, kuru Otrā pasaules kara laikā Vācijā nosūta dzīvot audžuģimenē. Meiteni ieintriģē vienīgā grāmata, ko viņa paņēmusi līdzi, tāpēc viņa sāk kolekcionēt grāmatas. Ar savu jauno vecāku un zem kāpnēm mītošā slepenā viesa palīdzību meitene iemācās lasīt un izveido brīnumainu pasauli, kas iedvesmo viņus visus.

programme.title: Vīrs, kurš izgudroja Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Stāsts par to, kā Čārlzs Dikenss uzrakstīja "Ziemassvētku stāstu", kas kļuva par īstu Ziemassvētku gara atainojumu.

programme.title: Brutālists
programme.desc: Bēgdams no pēckara Eiropas, arhitekts Lāslo Tots ierodas Amerikā, lai sāktu jaunu dzīvi, atrastu darbu un gaidītu sievu Eržēbeti, kura cenšas izkļūt no Austrumeiropas. Svešajā un jaunajā valstī Lāslo apmetas Filadelfijā, kur bagātais un ietekmīgais rūpnieks Harisons Lī Van Būrens pamana viņa talantu. Lāslo ir jāatrod savs ceļš jaunajā pasaulē, kurā valda citi noteikumi. Amerikāņu sapnis šķiet iluzors, panākumi un slava maksā lielu cenu…

programme.title: Jauns sākums
programme.desc: Greta un viņas draugs Deivs ir muzikanti un dziesmu autori, kopā jau ilgus gadus kopš koledžas laikiem. Brīdī, kad Deivs saņem piedāvājumu ierakstīt albumu no lielas ierakstu kompānijas, viņi pārvācas uz dzīvi Ņujorkā. Jauniegūtās slavas savaldzināts, Deivs pamet Gretu un uzsāk savu jauno mūziķa karjeru. Gretas dzīvē pozitīvu pavērsienu ienes nejauša satikšanās ar Denu, izbijušu ierakstu kompānijas menedžeri. Brīdī, kad Dens ierauga Gretu muzicējam nomaļā pilsētas klubā, viņu vienā mirklī apbur meitenes muzikālais talants un šarms. Līdz ar šo nejaušo sastapšanos abu dzīves ir nesaraujami saistītas, ļaujot sadziedēt brūces un sasniegt mērķus gan profesionālajā karjerā, gan privātajā dzīvē. Jauns dzīves sākums izstāstīts uz Ņujorkas vasaras fona.

programme.title: Slepkavība
programme.desc: Ceļojot vilcienā uz Ņūdeli, daži labie zēni nokļūst kautiņā ar sliktajiem.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Real Madrid - FC Barcelona
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Cīņu sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: Futbols: Ligue 1. PSG - Lille
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: LaLiga. Real Madrid - Levante
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Ekstrēmais sports: FIS PK. Bansko (BUL) Parallel Giant Slalom
Serie A. Napoli - Sassuolo
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

NBA. Dallas Mavericks - Utah Jazz
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.desc: Catch up on the latest news, highlights and behind-the-scenes action on this weeks edition of NBA on Fire.

programme.title: Basketbols: ACB league. Piektā ceturtdaļa.. 14. raidījums
programme.desc: Each episode covers key moments from the games, statistics, strategies, as well as interviews with players and coaches. Its a show for true basketball fans who want to stay up to date with the latest trends and news from the world of sports.

programme.title: Teniss: ATP 250 Adelaide. Vienspēles. Fināls
programme.desc: The Adelaide International is a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts in Adelaide, South Australia at the Memorial Drive Tennis Centre. The tournament is held in January or February, and forms part of the WTA Tour.

The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: NBA. Houston Rockets - Minnesota Timberwolves
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Futbols: Ligue 1. PSG - Lille
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Paris - AS Monaco
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. programme.title: Cīņu sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: Bundesliga. Borussia Dortmund - St. Pauli
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: LaLiga. Real Betis - Villarreal
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.desc: British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen joins European lottery winners as they hunt for a dream home. From exotic castles to refurbished cottages, Laurence helps them get their foot in the real estate market across the United Kingdom and Europe.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Sin City Rehab
programme.desc: Alison takes on the home of a dear friend and famous chef Antonia Lofaso, and the pressures on to deliver a spectacular chefs kitchen.

programme.title: The Flip Off
programme.desc: Tarek El Moussa and Christina Haack built a home-flipping empire and top HGTV series with Flip or Flop—but it all came crashing down after their much-publicized divorce. Now, Tarek and Christina are back in the networks new highly anticipated series The Flip Off, a throwdown competition to see which ex can find, buy, renovate and flip a house for the biggest financial gain.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn find a hidden gem in Kaneohe. They transform the modest space into a beautiful blend of nature and island living.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Mike and Denese strive to fix a house whose additions gained lots of space, but little function, for a nervous client with a Thanksgiving deadline.

programme.desc: Reality TV show presents further steps taken by the families who achieved their dreams and purchased vacation homes. programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A Virginia couple, tired of staying with family while visiting Kill Devil Hills, wants their own piece of paradise. They would like something move-in ready with a fenced yard for their dogs that they can rent for a few years.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: The Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Why are humans so different from every other species on Earth? Did we evolve from apes or is our intelligence the result of contact with an otherworldly source?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Emerald City Adventures. Rick, Corey, and Chum are in Seattle, Washington. In between throwing fish at Pikes Market, the guys are hoping to find gems in the Emerald city, with a little help from their experts.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The patriotic pals will call on trusted experts to help lay down the law for good deals. Between the events, Chum and Corey get carried away in a massive mansion, and Rick considers a million-dollar memento from a pivotal piece of Americas past.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
