Toreiz vecākiem atbalstam rocība bija maza, tāpēc pašam nācās piestrādāt viesnīcā. Priekšnieku bija daudz, un ar katru dienu augtin auga pārliecība, ka no ierindnieka ir jāpārtop par ģenerāli. Savulaik spēlēja pats, tiekot pat līdz Latvijas čempiona titulam, vēlāk jau kā treneris Lielvārdes komandu aizveda līdz valsts čempionu kausam, saņemdams par to arī Ogres novada gada balvu sportā. Šodien viņa ikdiena paiet kā sporta skolotājam vietējā pamatskolā, bet vakarpusē viņš dodas trenēt jaunos florbola talantus Lielvārdes Sporta centrā. Ak jā, pa vidu pedagoga un trenera darbam Kaspars pamanās ar makšķeri aizskriet turpat līdz Daugavai. Tas ļoti palīdz izvēdināt galvu.

programme.title: Vides fakti
programme.desc: Raidījums par norisēm dabā un apkārtējā vidē. "Vides fakti" sniedz informāciju par sezonālām norisēm dabā un dzīvnieku pasaulē, par vides aktualitātēm, par videi draudzīgu dzīvesveidu, par aktuālām cilvēka un vides attiecībām ārpus Latvijas robežām. Raidījumā "Vides fakti" ir skatāmi arī piedzīvojumu sižeti par aktīvā tūrisma iespējām Latvijā, kā arī īsfilmas par neparastiem ceļojumiem pasaulē.

programme.title: Ceturtā studija
programme.desc: Raidījuma "4. studija" misija ir palīdzēt risināt sabiedrībai aktuālus ikdienas jautājumus visās dzīves sfērās, kas ietekmē katra indivīda un sabiedrības dzīves kvalitāti. Raidījuma misija formulēta sauklī "Neērti jautājumi ērtākai ikdienai". Raidījums aktualizē problēmas, ar kurām saskaras ikviens Latvijas iedzīvotājs, sākot ar ģimeni, mācību un darba vidi, publisko telpu un beidzot ar dažādu privāto, pašvaldību un valsts iestāžu darbību un to sniegtajiem pakalpojumiem.

programme.title: Ceturtā studija
programme.desc: Raidījuma "4. studija" misija ir palīdzēt risināt sabiedrībai aktuālus ikdienas jautājumus visās dzīves sfērās, kas ietekmē katra indivīda un sabiedrības dzīves kvalitāti. Raidījuma misija formulēta sauklī "Neērti jautājumi ērtākai ikdienai". Raidījums aktualizē problēmas, ar kurām saskaras ikviens Latvijas iedzīvotājs, sākot ar ģimeni, mācību un darba vidi, publisko telpu un beidzot ar dažādu privāto, pašvaldību un valsts iestāžu darbību un to sniegtajiem pakalpojumiem.

programme.title: Ceturtā studija
programme.desc: Raidījuma "4. studija" misija ir palīdzēt risināt sabiedrībai aktuālus ikdienas jautājumus visās dzīves sfērās, kas ietekmē katra indivīda un sabiedrības dzīves kvalitāti. Raidījuma misija formulēta sauklī "Neērti jautājumi ērtākai ikdienai". Raidījums aktualizē problēmas, ar kurām saskaras ikviens Latvijas iedzīvotājs, sākot ar ģimeni, mācību un darba vidi, publisko telpu un beidzot ar dažādu privāto, pašvaldību un valsts iestāžu darbību un to sniegtajiem pakalpojumiem.

programme.title: Vides fakti
programme.desc: Raidījums par norisēm dabā un apkārtējā vidē. "Vides fakti" sniedz informāciju par sezonālām norisēm dabā un dzīvnieku pasaulē, par vides aktualitātēm, par videi draudzīgu dzīvesveidu, par aktuālām cilvēka un vides attiecībām ārpus Latvijas robežām. Raidījumā "Vides fakti" ir skatāmi arī piedzīvojumu sižeti par aktīvā tūrisma iespējām Latvijā, kā arī īsfilmas par neparastiem ceļojumiem pasaulē.

programme.title: Daudz laimes, jubilār!
programme.desc: Ja par jubilejām saucam dzimšanas dienas, kas beidzas ar nulli vai par pusapaļu dēvēto piecinieku, tad Maksimam Buselam, lieliskajam Rīgas Krievu teātra aktierim, šogad tādas nav. 15. janvārī viņam aprit 33. Interesanti, ka tieši šo, ne-jubilejas skaitli, mēdz uzskatīt par iezīmīgu cilvēka liktenī, bieži to saistot ar Kristus nodzīvotajiem 33 gadiem. Lai nu kā arī būtu, Dievs Maksimu apveltījis ar krāšņām talantu dāvanām. Un jau no pašas dzimšanas: muzikālā dzirde un lieliska ritma un kustību izjūta. Tas, ko visu savu apzinīgo mūžu darījis Busels pats, - nerimstoši šīs dāvanas attīstījis un turpina to darīt nudien smagā darbā. Tagad daudzi grib strādāt tieši ar viņu - dažādi režisori tieši Maksimā redz savu iestudējumu galveno varoni. Savos 33 jaunais aktieris jau nospēlējis grāfu Monte-Kristo jeb Edmonu Dantesu, Tartifu, kā arī lomu lomu Viljama Šekspīra Hamletu. Viņš uzvarējis televīzijas deju šovā un vēl lielākus laurus plūcis Latvijas Televīzijas lieliskajā talantu ciklā "Pārdziedi mani!", kam pagājušogad sekoja visa Latvija. Maksims vairākkārt nominēts "Spēlmaņu nakts" balvai, ir arī Harija Liepiņa balvas laureāts, bet vissvarīgākā ikvienam māksliniekam ir "Skatītāju simpātijas" balva. Busels nudien ir dāmu mīlulis, viņa pielūdzējas ir visdažādākajos vecumos - no jaunām meitenēm līdz sirmām kundzēm. Raidījumā "Daudz laimes, jubilār!" par šarmanto aktieri izsakās divas aktierim ļoti svarīgas dāmas: mamma Renāte un māsa Darja, kas savu sveicienu vecākajam brālim noslēdz ar sirsnīgu pateicību: "Paldies, ka manu dzīvi pārvērti pasakā!"

programme.title: Tutas Lietas
programme.desc: Cik rokai ir pirkstu? Kā pagatavot kūku no smiltīm? Un kā skan bungas? Izzinot sevi un pasauli, bērniem ir daudz jautājumu. "Tutas lietas" ir video stāstu sērija bērniem vecumā no viena līdz pieciem gadiem, ko žurnāliste un raidījumu vadītāja Marta Selecka radījusi kopā ar domubiedriem – mazu bērnu vecākiem no kino un TV profesionāļu vides. Raidījuma būtība – tas ir mīļš un izglītojošs ekrāna saturs pašiem mazākajiem, viņiem saprotamā valodā par interesantām un noderīgām tēmām. Raidījuma galvenā varone ir jaukā meitene, bērnu draudzene Tuta. Viņas lomā iejutusies aktrise un mamma Liene Sebre. Tuta mazajiem jautru rotaļu veidā māca pašus pirmos vārdus, krāsas, dziesmiņas un skaitļus. Kopā ar Tutu jaunas lietas bērniem apgūt palīdz arī draudzīgā un ziņkārīgā Lapsa. "Tutas lietu" stāstiņu kopējo konceptu veidojusi Marta Selecka, bet scenārijus sagatavojusi jaunā, talantīgā bērnu autore Inga Mastiņa. Bērniem saistošu radošu vizuālo noskaņu radījusi pieredzējusī dizainere Ilze Žūriņa-Šeibaka, bet Tutas dziesmas mūzikas autore un izpildītāja ir dziedātāja un komponiste Laura Polence. Tutas piedzīvojumus iemūžinājis operators Dāvis Doršs, bet projekta režiju un montāžu veidojusi Andra Doršs, kura par savu darbu Latvijas kino projektos ieguvusi arī Nacionālo kino balvu "Lielais Kristaps".

programme.title: Ralfs gatavo
programme.desc: Bērnu fantāzijai nav robežu! Un virtuvē, kurā saimnieko brālīši Ralfs un Martins, gatavošana ātri vien kļūst par izklaidi. Bagete šeit vienā mirklī pārvēršas zobenā, pūdercukurs kļūst par sniegu, no sviesta tiek būvētas piramīdas, bet no mīklas top vesels zoodārzs. Un, lai katrā sērijā uzzinātu arī kaut ko jaunu un vērtīgu par dažādiem pārtikas produktiem, puikas brauc ciemos – meklēt lielāko ķirbi, kārtīgi pasvīst zemeņu vagās, skaitīt graudiņus kukurūzas vālītēs un apciemot kaziņas. Meties šajā piedzīvojumā kopā ar mazajiem pavāriem un skaties jaunās "Ralfs gatavo" sērijas sestdienās 9:30 no rīta LTV1 un LSM bērnistabā!

programme.title: Neatklātā Zemgale
programme.desc: Raidījums par vietām un cilvēkiem Zemgalē.

programme.title: Neatklātā Zemgale
programme.desc: Raidījums par vietām un cilvēkiem Zemgalē.

programme.title: Neatklātā Zemgale

programme.title: Ielas garumā
programme.desc: Jauno gadu sākot, atgriežamies vasarīgajā Liepājā, lai turpinātu meklēt ielas un mājas, kas pārtapa vai izzuda tad, kad daļa no Velnciema kļuva par Laumas mikrorajonu. Stārķu iela pazaudēja divstāvu koka ēkas, tomēr saglabāja privātmāju apbūvi un agrāko ielas raksturu, bet par Zvirbuļu un Cīruļu ielām liecina vien vārds un pa vienai mājai katrā. Pārvērtību laikā piedzīvotais dokumentēts fotogrāfijās, bet asmēlīgie kurzemnieki pievieno savus komentārus. Tomēr uzņēmīgi velnciemieši gluži vai no drupām uzcēluši vietējo "pili" - apkārtnes iedzīvotājiem labi zināmo agrāko aptiekas māju _, bet Kristaps Porziņģis Velnciemam uzdāvinājis basketbola laukumu.

programme.title: Aculiecinieks
programme.desc: 13 minūšu gari televīzijas stāsti vēsta par notikumiem un Latvijā īpašiem cilvēkiem, aptverot vēsturiskus, zinātnes, izglītības, pilsētas, lauku un daudzus citus tematus.

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Atkritumu konteinerā tiek atrasts nodurts Vīnes modelis Marks Reinhards. Doktors Grafs autopsijā konstatē, ka Marks ticis noindēts jau pirms dūrieniem. Brantneram un viņa lieliskajai komandai jāienirst modes un bohēmas pasaulē, kur valda narkotikas, kaislības un greizsirdība, bet Reksis izbauda prožektoru spozmi.

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Baznīcā ir atrasts miris zīdainis bez vardarbības pazīmēm. Izmeklētājiem ir viens sīks pavediens - bērna elpceļos atrasta putna spalva. Tā ir tik neparasta, ka ātri vien atklājas noziedzīgu nodarījumu virkne, kuras galvenais mērķis ir bijusi zīdaiņu tirdzniecība. Galvenais vaininieks inspektoriem nemitīgi liek šķēršļus. Tomēr Reksim izdodas gan notvert noziedzniekus, gan palīdzēt izmisušai mātei atgūt savu nolaupīto mazuli.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Oseanas māte ir slimnīcā, meitene uzbrukusi arī viņas draugam Žanam. Dasja satraucas, ka Menings tiks atbrīvots pret drošības naudu. Daniels pieņem darbā sekretāri Astrodo kundzi, kas palīdzēs Patrikam izpētīt Nadīnes personīgā datora saturu.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Daiļslidošana. Eiropas čempionāts Šefīldā
programme.desc: Visaugstāk no eiropiešiem šīs sezonas reitingā ir francūzis Adams Siao Him Fā, viņš jau vairākkārt ieguvis godalgas Eiropā, taču dažkārt ir tik emocionāls, ka pieļauj vairākas kļūdas izpildījumā. Par uzvaru noteikti gribēs pacīnīties arī itālis Daniels Grasls, tāpat pērnā gada Eiropas čempions Lukass Bričgi no Šveices, ļoti perspektīvs ir Gruzijas sportists Nika Egadze. Daiļslidošanas līdzjutēji stipri atšķiras no sporta spēļu faniem, un tiem galvenais ir gūt izcilu baudījumu no slidojuma un mākslinieciskās uzstāšanās, tik daudz nepārdzīvojot, vai pašu valsts sportists ir uz goda pjedestāla vai ne. Uzstāšanās ziņā tuvu līderiem ir arī Deniss Vasiļjevs, taču tehniskajā izpildījumā, lēcienu sarežģītībā viņš tomēr krietni atpaliek no pasaulē labākajiem. Eiropai gan pašlaik nav tādu talantu kā ASV un Japānai, un tāpēc ir iespēja būt labāko vidū. Raudzīsim, vai izvēles programmai kvalificēsies arī jaunais Latvijas pilsonis, ukraiņu izcelsmes daiļslidotājs Fedirs Kulišs.

programme.title: Melnais saraksts
programme.desc: Kritiķu un skatītāju iemīļots kriminālseriāls. Tā darbība sākas dienā, kad darbu FIB galvenajā birojā Vašingtonā uzsāk jauna profilētāja Elizabete Kīna. Tajā pašā rītā tur ierodas viens no FIB meklētākajiem noziedzniekiem, Reimonds "Reds" Redingtons, un labprātīgi ļauj sevi notvert. Reds palīdz FIB sagūstīt citu bīstamu noziedznieku un novērst uzbrukumu civiliedzīvotājiem. Viņš paziņo, ka viņam esot vesels saraksts un informācija par tādiem noziedzniekiem un teroristiem, par kuru esamību FIB pat nenojauš. Reds ir gatavs sadarboties ar vienu savādu noteikumu – viņš runās tikai ar Elizabeti. Tā sākas īpašas attiecības, kuru īstā daba un iemesls ir zināmi tikai Redingtonam. Lai gan pamatā seriāla darbība norit ASV, tas aizved arī uz dažādām eksotiskām vietām visā pasaulē un ļauj ieskatīties kriminālajā pasaulē. Dažādiem apbalvojumiem vairāku gadu laikā izvirzīti seriāla specefektu veidotāji, kaskadieri un muzikālais noformējums.

programme.title: Atgriešanās paradīzē
programme.desc: Londonas policijas inspektore Makenzija Klārka atgriežas dzimtajā pilsētiņā Austrālijā. Daudzi vietējie nav priecīgi, ieraugot Makenziju, un arī viņa pati vēlas pēc iespējas ātrāk tikt prom. Sevišķi neveikla ir atkalredzēšanās ar tiesu medicīnas ekspertu Glenu, kas kādreiz bijis Makenzijas līgavainis, un viņa māti Filomenu, policijas priekšnieci. Taču izrādās, ka Makenziju Londonā tik drīz vēl negaida atpakaļ un vietējai policijai vajadzīga pieredzējuša slepkavību izmeklētāja palīdzība.

programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi
programme.desc: Dažādas mūsu ikdienā ierastas darbības un notikumi, izskaidroti no zinātnes viedokļa.

programme.title: Daiļslidošana. Eiropas čempionāts Šefīldā
programme.desc: Čempionāta rīkotājiem britiem ir lieliska iespēja pacīnīties par uzvaru, pasaules reitingā Lila Fīra un Lūiss Gibsons ir pirmajā vietā šajā sezonā. Spēcīgs duets ir arī Lietuvai, ko pārstāv Elisone Rīda un Sauļus Ambrulevičs. Lietuvieši var pacīnīties par medaļām, taču diezin vai par paša augstākā kaluma, tādi brīnumi daiļslidošanā nenotiek. Tiesnešu vērtējums nu jau vairs nav tik subjektīvs kā senāk, tomēr mazs subjektīvisma elements pastāv arī tagad un tiesneši favorītiem piedod vairāk nekā pārējiem.

programme.title: Vides fakti
programme.desc: Raidījums par norisēm dabā un apkārtējā vidē. "Vides fakti" sniedz informāciju par sezonālām norisēm dabā un dzīvnieku pasaulē, par vides aktualitātēm, par videi draudzīgu dzīvesveidu, par aktuālām cilvēka un vides attiecībām ārpus Latvijas robežām. Raidījumā "Vides fakti" ir skatāmi arī piedzīvojumu sižeti par aktīvā tūrisma iespējām Latvijā, kā arī īsfilmas par neparastiem ceļojumiem pasaulē.

programme.title: Kultūrdeva
programme.desc: "Kultūrdevā" viesosies aktrise Māra Mennika, kura gada nogalē Valmieras teātrī svinējusi pirmizrādi režisora Reiņa Suhanova jauniestudējumam "Mēdeja" — mūsdienīgam sengrieķu traģēdijas skatuviskam uzvedumam, kurā valda dedzinošas jūtas. Respektējot aktuālo notikumu kontekstu, Mārai Mennikai adresēsim izrādes uzdoto jautājumu — vai Mēdejai aizvainojumā ir tiesības uzcelto visšaušalīgākajā veidā noārdīt līdz pamatiem? Raidījuma otrajā daļā, nosvinot radio "Klasika" 30. jubileju, viesosies kanāla līderes muzikoloģes Gunda Vaivode un Inga Saksone. Leģendāri raidījumi un stāsti par neaizmirstamiem koncertiem un sarunām ēterā.

programme.title: Mani hiti
programme.desc: "MyHits TV" atskaņo gan pašmāju, gan ārzemju labākos un karstākos šībrīža hitus – rūpīgi atlasīti TOP 40 formāta ritmi jūsu ekrānā!

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord tries to tow out a car that crashed sixty metres into a field after a snowstorm, but gets stressed when a winch failure threatens the rescue. In the north, a truck driver avoids a head-on collision by steering his truck and trailer off the road, into hard packed snow. Raido takes charge of the rescue, but whatever he does its never enough. Six hours in, the truck stays stuck, and the rookie must dig deep to turn this mission around.

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment: Unlocking the Truth
programme.desc: Introducing historys most notorious psychological experiment, but with a twist. The studys prisoner and guard participants take a seat in front of the camera to reveal never before heard details of an event that has shaped our understanding of human nature and good versus evil for the past fifty years. Together they track the key events that took place over the six fateful days in 1971.

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment: Unlocking the Truth
programme.desc: What if we told you the Stanford Prison Experiment is not what it seems? The participants reveal new perspectives surrounding what happened in the fateful hallway, putting to question Dr. Zimbardos long-held claims. With the help of an intrepid French researcher, we learn that the fifty-year old story is riddled with lies. Meanwhile, the filmmakers expose their own storytelling devices.

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment: Unlocking the Truth
programme.desc: In a pivotal interview. Dr. Zimbardo takes a seat in front of the camera and defends his notorious experiment and its lessons. Meanwhile, an unexpected and exciting reunion takes place that exposes new layers to the story. This isnt a tale about an experiment debunked, but rather one about the power of perspective and mythmaking.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP Nogales stops a pedestrian carrying fentanyl internally and seizes a vehicle with a mixed load of heroin and fentanyl with a combined street value of over $760,000. In San Diego, CBP officers empty a gas tank filled with 35 packages of meth, all tied together for quick retrieval. Spring breakers return to Atlantas airport with varying contraband, including $38,000 of undeclared cash inside a bag of dirty laundry.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The latest sonar technology reveals shipwrecks as never seen before. As water and land drain away: a secret beneath Manhattans skyline, an earth-shattering feat of engineering, a record-breaking icon and a casualty of WWI stealth warfare. Examining these hidden giants can explain New York Citys meteoric rise to bustling world metropolis. A city that cant be kept down, forever pushing forward, with true grit and determination.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With flames emerging through the cockpit floor, the pilots of Pilgrim Airlines 458 are desperate to land. Amid smoke, extreme heat and zero visibility, they somehow manage to touch down on a frozen Rhode Island reservoir. Within minutes, the inferno destroys any evidence of how the fire started. And with no data recorder, its a surviving pilot who ultimatley gives investigators the break they need.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Ireland doesnt take up much room on the map, but few places have such a celebrated identity; over 70 million people around the world claim Irish heritage. Hannah Fry goes beyond the pubs and parades to discover what it really means to be Irish today. Along the windswept coast of Donegal Bay, she dives into Irelands surprising surfing scene, where dramatic geology is forging a new bond with the sea. She places a bet at the Punchestown races, exploring how a connection to the land became a multi-billion Euro industry. In a moment of personal discovery, Hannah uncovers her own Irish DNA and how her family history holds clues to Irish identity. As her journey ends, Hannah steps into the spotlight to try her hand at one of Irelands most cherished traditions: storytelling.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah Fry visits Iceland to discover how this stark, treeless island became a global success story. On the geologically active Reykjanes Peninsula, she meets scientists whose lava-flow predictions saved the world-famous Blue Lagoon spa from destruction, and in Hengill she sees how a futuristic algae farm is fuelled by geothermal power - and imagination. A dip in the countrys oldest swimming pool reveals how Icelands unusually small gene pool is helping advance global health, while a horseback ride across a black sand landscape immortalised in the Icelandic sagas shows how Viking heritage continues to inspire creativity. The Icelanders Hannah encounters dont just live on the land; they negotiate with it. Their collective determination and adaptability has forged an island of ideas - and a tourist magnet the world cannot resist.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: Bryan Johnsons first case as a new detective in 2020 was a homicide - a man found near an oil well site in Stark County, Ohio. But four years later, without even a name for the victim, Bryan has not been able to close the case. He enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and find out the mans identity.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: For 28 years, the horrifying case of a young man who was burned alive sat on a shelf in the Atlanta Police Department. Without a name for him, the case remained inactive. Now, investigators have teamed up with the DNA Doe Project to attempt to identify the "man on fire" and at last provide his family with resolution.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: After taking the title of khan, Chinggis consolidated power by building a formidable army and eliminating rivals like the shaman Teb Tengri. Chinggis began his conquests with bold campaigns against the Tanguts and the Jin Empires, where brutal sieges of the city involved bold new military maneuvers, expanding the Mongol Empire to unprecedented heights.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: At its height in the early 16th century, the temples and palaces of Cuzco overflowed with fine goods and precious metals. The wealth of the Incas even helped inspire the legend of El Dorado. Meet the most powerful Inca emperor: Huayna Capac, known for his violent and ruthless rule. Over his 30-year reign, Huayna Capac spent long periods campaigning in the north of his empire, conquering new lands and suppressing rebellions. With an iron grip, he maintained control, enforced mandatory labor, exported agricultural technologies, relocated hundreds of thousands of people across the Andes, and centralized South Americas production in Cuzco.

programme.title: Colosseum
programme.desc: The Colosseum and its gladiatorial games stand as a symbol of Romes power and reach for over a century until coins, recently discovered at the site, indicate an empire in crisis. What role does the Colosseum play in Romes decline and fall? Investigations take archaeologists to ruins in Austria, Tunisia, and Rome, as they uncover the story of the empires collapse.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: The major challenge for police at Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez International Airport: stop drug-trafficking. Officers arrest a man with cocaine-filled food packages. He may be hiding more. An elderly woman is stopped with drugs embedded in her bag. A mother with a drug-saturated package her suitcase says she is also being sent to work as a prostitute. A man claims drugs taped to his body are for personal use. A long-lost bag contains cocaine.

programme.title: Airport Security: Brazil
programme.desc: Federal Police at Sao Paolo International Airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. Their main threat, cocaine smuggling. Agents arrest two different traffickers with bricks of cocaine branded in the same curious way. One of those loads is among the largest of the last few years. Panicked asylum seekers refuse to cooperate, causing an uproar. And suitcases carrying hundreds of counterfeit goods are intercepted.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: In Californias Mojave Desert, Virgin Galactic test pilots are at the controls of a revolutionary aircraft designed for sub-orbital flight. But as the spaceship accelerates toward the outer reaches of Earths atmosphere, approaching the speed of sound, it breaks apart and falls from the sky. With the future of commercial space travel hanging in the balance, its up to investigators to figure out what went wrong.

programme.title: Top Ten Natural Disasters
programme.desc: In this 2 hour, National Geographic special, 10 world experts formulate a list of the most important natural disasters of all time. Using eye witness video, historical archive and cutting edge CGI, they not only reveal the key moments that turned a natural phenomenon into a human catastrophe, but explain why the disaster theyve selected is a genuine game-changer, worthy of its place as a one of the Top Ten Natural Disasters.

programme.title: Americas Deadliest Volcano Disaster
programme.desc: Forty years ago, on May 18, 1980, Mount St. Helens erupted violently. It was the most deadly and devastating eruption in U.S. history. Combining eyewitness accounts with rarely seen images, this show reveals the unfolding apocalypse; from the first moments of the volcanic blast, to a 12-mile high ash plume and the lethal mudflows that raged down the mountain.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The tranquillity of Montserrat, an island paradise in the Caribbean, is shattered in 1995 when the Soufriere Hills erupt for the first time in recorded history. The eruption takes the population of Montserrat by surprise. Scientists flock to the island and closely monitor the volcano over the next two years. Evacuations take place and an exclusion zone is mapped out. Then at 12:45pm on June 25th 1997 two years after the first eruption a massive tremor rocks the mountain. A plume of hot ash and steam soon spews into the air; reaching 45,000 feet in a matter of minutes and shrouding half the island in darkness. There follows 25 minutes of violent activity. When the ash finally settles many hours later, a scene of total devastation is revealed; many villages are buried and 19 people are dead. Many others are lucky to be alive. Montserrat is scandalised by the deaths and an investigation gets underway to discover how and why the deaths occurred.

programme.title: Tsunami: Race Against Time
programme.desc: A massive earthquake in the Indian Ocean sets off a tsunami that, within minutes, arrives in the bustling city of Aceh, causing unprecedented havoc and devastation. This film follows the desperate struggle to survive of city-dwellers in Indonesia and tourists in Thailand caught in the unfolding catastrophe, as well as the scientists working against the clock to warn the world.

programme.title: Tsunami: Race Against Time
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake triggered the deadliest tsunami in recorded history, multiple waves hit Thailand. As the beaches of popular resorts are pummeled by unstoppable torrents of water, locals and tourists work together to save lives. In the chaotic aftermath, survivors separated by the waves desperately search for their loved ones.

programme.title: The Devils Climb
programme.desc: Alex Honnold and Tommy Caldwell are two of the greatest rock climbers of all time - and best friends. Together, they set off on an epic adventure cycling 2,500 miles enroute to a daring climb of The Devils Thumb, a legendary 9,000-foot Alaskan peak surrounded by old-growth rainforest. Tommy is recovering from a career-threatening injury making the expeditions success uncertain.

programme.title: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
programme.desc: Will struggles in bone-chilling winds in the South Pole, where temperatures can drop below -100°F. He skis, treks and climbs across giant icefields and cliffs with the support of one of the worlds best polar athletes, Richard Parks. In one of the planets most isolated research stations, scientists take ice cores deep under the surface and make incredible sacrifices to pursue their research.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The shroud of Turin is one of the most debated archaeological artifacts in the world. Is it the burial cloth of the Christian messiah, Jesus of Nazareth, or is it an elaborate fake? Every time the evidence points one way or another, a credible counter argument is raised. In the collective imagination of the mid-20th century, jetpacks were the personalized transportation of the future. American engineer Wendell Moore really did develop and test a model for the military, so why dont we all have one? Buried for 2,400 years, a pair of beautiful cups are discovered in a grave mound made by Scythians, an ancient civilization of the Caucasus Mountains. What can the cups be for if they have holes in the bottom? And why are they solid gold?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Outside Draskow, Poland, an undocumented cemetery hundreds of years old is found in 2010 containing a womans skeleton with a blade on her stomach, a stone on her neck and a green color in her mouth. Was this strange burial a precaution against the living dead? During the cold war, the United States developed a surveillance tool that was the first of its kind—code name: Project Corona. Did the shiny golden dome really help avert nuclear Armageddon? Countless literati have studied Shakespeares plays for his profound prose, but what about for secret-coded messages? In the 1800s, Dr. Orville Ward Owen built a hulking wooden machine to do just that and concluded that Shakespeare was not who we think. Does his theory stand up to scrutiny?

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: The major challenge for police at Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez International Airport: stop drug-trafficking. Officers arrest a man with cocaine-filled food packages. He may be hiding more. An elderly woman is stopped with drugs embedded in her bag. A mother with a drug-saturated package her suitcase says she is also being sent to work as a prostitute. A man claims drugs taped to his body are for personal use. A long-lost bag contains cocaine.

programme.title: Airport Security: Brazil
programme.desc: Federal Police at Sao Paolo International Airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. Their main threat, cocaine smuggling. Agents arrest two different traffickers with bricks of cocaine branded in the same curious way. One of those loads is among the largest of the last few years. Panicked asylum seekers refuse to cooperate, causing an uproar. And suitcases carrying hundreds of counterfeit goods are intercepted.

programme.title: X-Ray Earth
programme.desc: Beneath our feet, under trillions of tons of rock, lurk astonishing and deadly secrets. Earthquakes, tsunamis, volcanic eruptions are all driven by hidden forces deep inside our planet. Now, using the latest scientific data from sensors and surface scans, we can x-ray the earth to reveal the dangers locked inside our planet.Using thousands of sensors and state of the art surface scan information, for the first time, we can create x-rays of the deep interior of our planet.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: June 2nd 1994 and RAF Chinook helicopter was engaged in a routine but important task transporting 25 members of the Northern Ireland security and intelligence community from RAF Aldergrove in Northern Ireland to Fort George near Inverness. This journey was brought to a dramatic end when the Chinook crashed into the Mull of Kintyre. One of the worst losses of life sustained by the RAF in a peacetime accident, the subsequent investigation also ignited controversy. Was there really enough evidence to call it pilot error?

programme.title: Costa Concordia Disaster
programme.desc: An in-depth look at how Italys largest cruise ship ran aground off the Italian coast.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The Deepwater Horizon rig has finished drilling the Macondo Well for BP in the Gulf of Mexico. The well, in water 1500m deep, extends to a depth of 4000m. The crew test the well to ensure it is safely sealed so the Deepwater Horizon rig can move on before another rig starts oil extraction. But just hours after the well passes its safety test, flammable gas and crude oil shoot out of the well, enveloping the rig in flames and killing 11 workers. Seconds from Disaster investigates the series of decisions and failings that culminated in the catastrophe and the worlds biggest accidental marine oil spill.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: In March 2011, as Japan reels from the most powerful earthquake in its history, a 14 metre-high tsunami surges over the Fukushima Dai-ichi nuclear power plant, knocking out its power supply and essential cooling systems. With the plant blacked out, engineers face nuclear meltdown. The reactors begin to overheat leading to two huge explosions that tear the plant apart and dispersing radiation. As Japan faces the worst nuclear emergency since Chernobyl, an international nuclear expert will investigate exactly what happed at Fukushima and see what, if anything, could have been done to prevent it.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The shroud of Turin is one of the most debated archaeological artifacts in the world. Is it the burial cloth of the Christian messiah, Jesus of Nazareth, or is it an elaborate fake? Every time the evidence points one way or another, a credible counter argument is raised. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Amsterdam Central 24/7
programme.desc: While Menno and Carolien have their hands full with an aggressive fare dodger, the incident response team searches for three illegal rail runners. This all happens the same day the Orient Express arrives to the station and Errol, the night conductor, has to deal with a train full of people coming from a concert.

programme.title: Amsterdam Central 24/7
programme.desc: Amsterdam Central is undergoing a mega renovation while the station remains fully operational. Today, the construction team, led by Leon, will demolish a dilapidated railway bridge. Meanwhile, officers Menno and Carolien deal with a woman who has fallen down an escalator.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Brad and the ground services team have just 90 minutes to turn around an Air India flight for take-off. A kangaroo in the car park keeps ground transport manager Trent on his toes. Environment officer Dave discovers illegal bee hives within the airport precinct, and baggage handler Brodie battles carousel jams.

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: A lone diamond from grandmas ring is lost at Pittsburghs airport by a young bride. Lost-and-found workers at Tampa International desperately try to find the owner of a fanny pack as it contains much-needed medication and $3,000 in cash. Travelers to a comic convention in Salt Lake City leave behind peculiar objects, including unique fan art acquired at the site.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Storms across the Eastern Seaboard batter short-haul destinations and ground outbound flights at Toronto International. Inside the terminal, tempers reach boiling point as delays and cancellations mount. Cargo handlers welcome some four-legged passengers as engineers carry out vital maintenance on a Dreamliner 787. Airfield Maintenance teams work around the clock to melt mountains of snow.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Embark on a thrilling journey through Spains greatest feats of engineering. From the awe-inspiring technology thats bringing Barcelonas iconic Sagrada Familia to completion, to the secrets of Sevilles record-breaking wooden sun shade. Marvel at a gravity-defying skyscraper that seems to hover in the sky, and step back in time as a 2,000-year-old Roman theatre is nursed back to life.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Venture into the heart of Polands most awe-inspiring engineering marvels. Watch as a super port rises from the depths of the sea, and uncover the secrets behind the tallest building in the European Union. Descend into the shadows beneath Wieliczka, where a sprawling city-sized mine lies hidden, then witness the towering legacy of the worlds tallest wooden structure.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As the students reach the midpoint of their training, they start the iconic dogfighting phase. Against them are seasoned instructors with hundreds of hours of real-world experience. To pass, they must outmaneuver the opponent and take a "kill shot." One student has the added pressure of flying with his Top Gun-trained commodore, while another struggles to control his aggressive instincts.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As they enter the second and most challenging phase of dogfighting, everything is on the line for our students. Defensive dogfighting involves dynamic maneuvers to evade being shot down by battle-hardened instructors. The physical strain proves too much for one student, while another has a crisis of confidence when past failures come back to haunt him.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route from Singapore to Perth, Qantas Airways Flight 72 takes a sudden nosedive over the Indian Ocean. Sudden G-forces are so violent passengers are lifted out of their seats. A series of over-speed and stall warnings flood the cockpit display, and its clear something is terribly wrong. An experienced fighter pilot, the captain manages to safely land the plane. Its up to Australian investigators to uncover the mysterious and potentially deadly malfunction thats putting one of the worlds most popular planes at risk.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did the shuttle Columbia tear itself to pieces during reentry? Why did so many die in the worst high speed train crash in history at Eschede in Germany? How did a concrete high rise in London called Grenfell Tower become an inferno that killed 72?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did the nuclear reactor at 3 Mile Island meltdown? How did a small truck fire in the Mt Blanc road tunnel become a lethal inferno? How did the seven year old Sampoong department store in South Korea collapse onto hundreds of shoppers?

programme.title: Costa Concordia Disaster
programme.desc: An in-depth look at how Italys largest cruise ship ran aground off the Italian coast.

programme.title: Sugarcane
programme.desc: A discovery of unmarked graves at an Indian residential school run by the Catholic Church in Canada sparks a national outcry. In response, an Indigenous community opens their own investigation into atrocities at a nearby school, revealing a system designed to destroy their way of life. Survivors excavate their own truths, finding the courage to face the past and break cycles of trauma.

programme.title: The Next Mega Tsunami
programme.desc: Ten years after one of the most deadly tsunamis ever known, scientists are making a shocking discovery. Experts used to believe that the biggest killer waves were only generated in a handful of regions.

programme.title: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
programme.desc: Will struggles in bone-chilling winds in the South Pole, where temperatures can drop below -100°F. He skis, treks and climbs across giant icefields and cliffs with the support of one of the worlds best polar athletes, Richard Parks. In one of the planets most isolated research stations, scientists take ice cores deep under the surface and make incredible sacrifices to pursue their research.

programme.title: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
programme.desc: Will, A MAN SCARED OF SPIDERS HIS WHOLE LIFE, ventures deep into the Ecuadorian Amazon in search of deadly creatures. Joined by professor Bryan Fry and local mountaineer Carla Perez, they abseil 200 feet into a cave network known as the "womb of the Earth," to discover the giant tarantula. Using cutting-edge techniques, they extract its venom, which could hold the key to saving millions of lives.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Lightning bolts cause construction mayhem whenever they strike buildings. All over the world, cities are sinking for very different reasons, and cooling towers are collapsing. A Mexico City metro train and many bridges in India all fall down. While in Dallas, an unlucky demolition becomes a cousin of the Leaning Tower of Pisa and a social media sensation. Regular people show off their MacGyver skills prompting the question: genius or harebrained?

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: An Italian supermarket under construction drastically collapsesy. Amusement parks become a lot less amusing when fires break out; Indias tunnel workers are trapped in a catastrophic collapse; Canadas light rail fails over and over again; and a stadium loses its lid to a hurricane. Plus, theres a look at how home constructions been misled by lead.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did the nuclear reactor at 3 Mile Island meltdown? How did a small truck fire in the Mt Blanc road tunnel become a lethal inferno? How did the seven year old Sampoong department store in South Korea collapse onto hundreds of shoppers?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Apollo 13 really explode 200,000 miles from Earth? What caused the devastating fire that swept through the MGM Grand in Las Vegas? Why could the world famous Ponte Morandi bridge in Italy simply collapse and kill 43 people?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did the Surfside condo block in Miami collapse on its sleeping residents? What caused the lethal fire in Kings Cross subway station when it was packed with commuters? Why did Russias Kursk nuclear submarine sink without warning?

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: A lone diamond from grandmas ring is lost at Pittsburghs airport by a young bride. Lost-and-found workers at Tampa International desperately try to find the owner of a fanny pack as it contains much-needed medication and $3,000 in cash. Travelers to a comic convention in Salt Lake City leave behind peculiar objects, including unique fan art acquired at the site.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Brad and the ground services team have just 90 minutes to turn around an Air India flight for take-off. A kangaroo in the car park keeps ground transport manager Trent on his toes. Environment officer Dave discovers illegal bee hives within the airport precinct, and baggage handler Brodie battles carousel jams.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Operating under a noise curfew between 0600-2300 hours, the pressure is on at Sydney Airport to complete 900 plane movements in a day. Duty Manager George is confronted by a suspicious package. Meanwhile Rookie Mel suddenly has 2 medical emergencies in the space of an hour. And a freight handling crew have a problem with loading a bulging cargo pod.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Storms across the Eastern Seaboard batter short-haul destinations and ground outbound flights at Toronto International. Inside the terminal, tempers reach boiling point as delays and cancellations mount. Cargo handlers welcome some four-legged passengers as engineers carry out vital maintenance on a Dreamliner 787. Airfield Maintenance teams work around the clock to melt mountains of snow.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Croatias Coast
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. The islands, mountains and forests of the Croatian coast reveal a world of unexpected wildlife and hidden natural treasures. In the mountains, chamois, lynx and bears roam the Velebit range against the backdrop of the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Winter. Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: With leopards in its mountains, blue whales off its coasts, and foxes roaming its city centres, Europe is a continent full of wild surprises. From the frozen glaciers of Iceland to the lush islands of the Azores, and from the rugged peaks of the Caucasus to the metropolis of London, the first episode in this stunning series highlights Europes astonishing diversity, all shot with breath-taking brio and the latest technology to reveal the continent and its animals in all its breath-taking glory.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: Europes mountains may offer incredible views, but they are rarely an easy place to live. Golden eagles must soar high over the Alps to find food, while stags in the Scottish Highlands battle it out for valuable grazing land. Kidnapping is rife among Gibraltars Barbary macaques, and - in Norways high plateaus - musk oxen cant escape the harsh merciless winter. Faced with rugged landscapes and extreme weather conditions, Europes high-altitude animals must either adapt… or die trying.

programme.title: Hunt for the Giant Squid
programme.desc: The giant squid is perhaps one of the most mysterious animals on the planet. Our attempts to find it and observe it in the wild have more or less failed. Are we missing something obvious? With the help of completely new cameras, and logic driven investigation, we think we know where and how to look. We really can shine some light on the enduring mystery of the giant squid - and perhaps even find one. Hunt for the Giant Squid will be a magical mystery tour through the some of the most unbelievable scenes nature has to offer: Glowing and flashing of living organisms - bioluminescence - that will lead us from shallow reefs to the realm of the giant squid.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Winter. Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: With leopards in its mountains, blue whales off its coasts, and foxes roaming its city centres, Europe is a continent full of wild surprises. From the frozen glaciers of Iceland to the lush islands of the Azores, and from the rugged peaks of the Caucasus to the metropolis of London, the first episode in this stunning series highlights Europes astonishing diversity, all shot with breath-taking brio and the latest technology to reveal the continent and its animals in all its breath-taking glory.

programme.title: Croc Wars: Grumeti Vs Mara
programme.desc: Each year, nearly two million wildebeest and zebra cross the Serengeti on a quest for fresh grazing. But two legendary rivers stand in their way—the Grumeti and the Mara—each ruled by a formidable dynasty of Nile crocodiles. In "Croc Wars," follow these ancient predators as they prepare for the feast of the year, but not all crocodiles are created equal. In the deep, fast waters of the Mara, privilege reigns, kills come easy, and food is plentiful. In the rugged Grumeti, crocodiles must outwit, adapt and fight for every scrap. From brutal ambushes to stolen kills, this is a high-stakes battle for survival on two rivers with two strategies and only one chance to eat.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Greece. Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve.

programme.title: Hostile Planet
programme.desc: HOSTILE PLANET is a ground-breaking wildlife series that explores Earths most hostile environments. Over the course of six episodes, we explore the extremes of deep, high, cold, hot, wet and dry and reveal the truly extraordinary ways in which animals have adapted to survive in the face of great adversity. Its always been a HOSTILE PLANET and yet, in the last 40 years, its got a whole lot tougher for the wildlife. The world has changed more in the last 40 years than at any time in the last 65 million. So animals in the most hostile places on Earth must adapt in the blink of an evolutionary eye. Facing everything from intrinsically hostile habitats and brutally punishing weather to the unrelenting threat of predators and intense competition for resources, their challenge is simple: adapt or die.

programme.title: Australias Wild Woodlands
programme.desc: "Australias Wild Woodlands" explores the rich biodiversity and resilience of Australias eucalyptus forests, home to the worlds largest variety of parrots and iconic species like the platypus. These woodlands span vast regions and support diverse wildlife, from red kangaroos to freshwater crocodiles. The film showcases the rare behaviors of marsupials and birds, highlighting threats from climate change and land clearing. Ancient ecosystems remain largely unchanged since the dinosaurs, but species like the Gouldian finch face uncertain futures. Through intimate storytelling, the documentary reveals the ecological importance and fragility of these vibrant landscapes.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Poland. Europes ancient landscapes have virtually disappeared, but some stretches remain. A rich mosaic of habitats still cover the country of Poland. Lush forests, vast lowlands and mountain peaks all team with life.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Germany. Germany is Europes most populous nation. A land hewn by mighty rivers and cloaked in forest. In these wild spaces, nature is full of surprises. From the Bavarian mountains to the North Sea, over a third of the country is now protected.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Greece. Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Iberia. The parched lands of the Iberian Peninsula give rise to snow-covered peaks, expanses of rare cork oak, and Europes only fog forest. Unique habitats, where species found nowhere else on earth fight for survival.

programme.title: Wild Transylvania: Draculas Hidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Shielded by the arc of the Carpathian Mountains, this part of Romania is one of Europes last true wildernesses.

programme.title: Australias Land of the Ancients
programme.desc: Australias Land of the Ancients explores the unique and ancient landscape of northeastern Australia, the most biodiverse region on the continent. From Crocodiles lying in wait for fish and hunting feral pigs to caring marsupial mothers of the far north, the film highlights some of the incredible species as they struggle to survive in their harsh environment amid a changing landscape.

programme.title: Tree Kangaroos: Ghosts of the Forest
programme.desc: Seldom seen and very rarely filmed in their natural environment, Lumholtz tree kangaroos are the ghosts of the north Queensland forests. This film follows the intimate lives of these tree-climbing specialists in the wilderness of the Atherton Tableland.

programme.title: Dolphins Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie Gregory is in the Azores, a marine sanctuary and vital pitstop for migrating ocean predators off the coast of Portugal. Its feeding season, as thousands of normally elusive predators join forces to hunt and feed on super-shoals of fish known as bait balls. A vast ocean and battling storms challenge the team for a chance to film the most spectacular feeding frenzy of Berties career.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Winter is the most punishing of seasons, a time of year when many animals seek shelter in order to hibernate, but others must face the harshness of their environment. This documentary series showcases the ruthless beauty of this icy season, revealing the animals who thrive in their freezing conditions and the animals who simply fight for survival. When the season finally passes spring is reborn, and it is a celebration for those who managed to survive unscathed.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Madagascars Weirdest Compilation
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Madagascar is an island nation set adrift for millions of years, leaving its wildlife in extreme isolation and causing some bizarre adaptations. Many of the creatures here are found nowhere else on earth.

programme.title: South Americas Weirdest Animals
programme.desc: South America is a rich and diverse land. Stunning landscapes harbor elusive critters that have evolved to thrive here. But survival is not assured because the abundant prey is closely followed by powerful predators.

programme.title: Strangest Nature
programme.desc: Evolution has created countless wondrous creatures that are colorful, amazing and strange. The darker side of nature reveals some of the most bizarre forms natural selection has produced. Gaze into the realm of gulpers: animals who waste no time eating their prey — often swallowing it whole. Something deadly lies silent in the leaf litter of West Africa. The Gaboon viper is loaded with the largest fangs and fastest strike of any snake. Further south, the solifuge, or sun spider, darts through the desert, seeking an unlucky bug to mince with its massive mandibles. Strange mouths are also in the ocean. The moray eel is a bizarre fish, but its most characteristic charm is hiding down its dark throat. These and more lie in store.

programme.title: Strangest Nature
programme.desc: Evolution has created countless wondrous creatures that are colorful, amazing and strange. The darker side of nature reveals some of the most bizarre forms natural selection has produced. Examine the weirdest animals that hide deep beneath the soils surface. A worm explodes from the seabed to yank fish into its mucky pit; a beetle tunnels deep into warm, wet dung; and a miniature digger excavates miles of tunnel with its teeth! Some hunt in swarms to overwhelm living prey, while solo operators rely on disguise and trickery to trap victims. Tunnellers display bizarre and ingenious solutions to survive in cramped, stuffy and dark conditions.

programme.title: South Americas Weirdest Animals
programme.desc: South America is a land of extremes. Existing here is a daunting proposition, and some well-known animals have adapted by growing large or very small, each strategy maximizing their chance of survival.

programme.title: Strangest Nature

The darker side of nature reveals some of the most bizarre forms natural selection has produced. Gaze into the realm of gulpers: animals who waste no time eating their prey — often swallowing it whole. Something deadly lies silent in the leaf litter of West Africa. The Gaboon viper is loaded with the largest fangs and fastest strike of any snake. Further south, the solifuge, or sun spider, darts through the desert, seeking an unlucky bug to mince with its massive mandibles. Strange mouths are also in the ocean. The moray eel is a bizarre fish, but its most characteristic charm is hiding down its dark throat. These and more lie in store.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Strangest Nature
programme.desc: Evolution has created countless wondrous creatures that are colorful, amazing and strange. The darker side of nature reveals some of the most bizarre forms natural selection has produced. Gaze into the realm of gulpers: animals who waste no time eating their prey — often swallowing it whole. Something deadly lies silent in the leaf litter of West Africa. The Gaboon viper is loaded with the largest fangs and fastest strike of any snake. Further south, the solifuge, or sun spider, darts through the desert, seeking an unlucky bug to mince with its massive mandibles. Strange mouths are also in the ocean. The moray eel is a bizarre fish, but its most characteristic charm is hiding down its dark throat. These and more lie in store.

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Madagascars Weirdest Compilation
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Madagascar is an island nation set adrift for millions of years, leaving its wildlife in extreme isolation and causing some bizarre adaptations. Many of the creatures here are found nowhere else on earth.

programme.title: South Americas Weirdest Animals
programme.desc: South America is a rich and diverse land. Stunning landscapes harbor elusive critters that have evolved to thrive here. But survival is not assured because the abundant prey is closely followed by powerful predators.

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Tree Kangaroos: Ghosts of the Forest
programme.desc: Seldom seen and very rarely filmed in their natural environment, Lumholtz tree kangaroos are the ghosts of the north Queensland forests. This film follows the intimate lives of these tree-climbing specialists in the wilderness of the Atherton Tableland.

programme.title: Madagascars Weirdest Compilation
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Madagascar is an island nation set adrift for millions of years, leaving its wildlife in extreme isolation and causing some bizarre adaptations. Many of the creatures here are found nowhere else on earth.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Winter is the most punishing of seasons, a time of year when many animals seek shelter in order to hibernate, but others must face the harshness of their environment. This documentary series showcases the ruthless beauty of this icy season, revealing the animals who thrive in their freezing conditions and the animals who simply fight for survival. When the season finally passes spring is reborn, and it is a celebration for those who managed to survive unscathed.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komandai jāizdekorē Sjerras Spīdošās skatuve, koncerts izvēršas neticams Bodnieks Gabriels rīko savu gardumu izstādi, un Rabla komanda dodas palīgā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Super Duper Zaķu Līga
programme.desc: Kad ļaunais Zeķpērtiķu karalis izmanto vienu no Stīva mīļākajām zeķēm, lai kontrolētu viņu, zaķiem viņš jāatmodina no transa, pirms viņus sakauj. Beksa un Stīvs apmainās ar ķermeņiem un ir spiesti izprast viens otra spējas.

programme.title: Super Duper Zaķu Līga
programme.desc: Super Duper Zaķu līga ir zaķu grupa, kas aizstāv pasauli no dažādiem blēžiem. Viņi cīnās gan pret kāriem kosmosa pirātiem, gan lavas briesmoņiem, izmantojot savas superspējas, lai aizsargātu patiesību, taisnīgumu un brīvo atpūtas laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni ir sajūsmā, kad viņu mīļākā TV zvaigzne Henks Hammers grib redzēt, kā viņi strādā. Kapteinis Turbo ir sagādājis pārsteigumu. Kad saceļas migla, komandai ir jāuzceļ bāka.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni atrod dinozauru kaulus un nolemj uzcelt dinozauru muzeju. Kad Omars salauž kāju, kucēniem jānodrošina rampas, lai viņš tomēr spētu turpināt piegādāt pastu.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tomijs piedalās raķešu sacīkstēs, Tims atbalsta savu brāli. Tims novērš Tijas domas no Taskija, kamēr tas mazgājas veļas mašīnā. Bērni kļūst par vecākiem, un vecāki - par bērniem.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš satiek Garnadzi un viņa krustdēlu Foksiju. Viņiem jānokļūst mājās, pirms Garnadzis un Foksijs pagūst nočiept spēļu lācīti. Dora satiek Zābaciņa māsīcu Cepurīti, un viņi dodas lietusmežā, lai meklētu īpašos zilos banānus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.
